242b6(mdo 'grel): bo/ bcom ldan 'das mchod pa ni bya ba kun las gtso bo'o/ /Shwa d+hi pa ti(mdo 'grel): yon tan nas bkar ba/ ba rnams las nag mo 'o ma phun sum tshogs pa'o/ /a ma/ de rnams las rgyal rigs mchog tu dpa' o/ /'phros don thor bu ba ni/ kirtra? kArya yo rak+tA dau kri ti ShaShI/ k+ta la sogs Am/ Am/ ba lang rnams kyi rer? bob lang rnams kyi mnga' bdag go//

243a1(mdo 'grel): sya sh+ra ba taM/ sma ra tau/ tsa karye ShaSh+Thi/ dran pa'i las la'ang drug ba'o/ /dran pa'i las dang 'brel ba'i don la drug ba 'jug cing gnyis ba'ang 'jug ste/ mA tu(mdo 'grel): sma ra ti/ mA ta raM sma ra ti/ rgyu dang sbyor ba la gsum pa dang lnga pa yang 'jug

243a7(mdo 'grel): tA rna ba 'on pa tadmra hme ti/ A dA di yi ga pany+tsa mI/ Ang la sogs pa sbyor ba la lnga ba'o/ /nyer bsgyur Ang la sogs pa mtshams 'dzin pa'i don du sbyor ba la rnam dbye lnga pa 'jug ste/ A pa Ta gang la skye rku rnams skyed bar byed pa de ni tshangs pa 'di'o//
243b1(mdo 'grel): la? pu trA dbri? Sh+To de za(mdo 'grel): de'i don la bzhi pa 'jug par bshad de/ de yang de'i don zhes pa don shin tu bzang pa sgrub na myur du 'grub nges pa zhig la zer nye/ dper na/ saM ya mA ya sh+rU taM d+han+te na ro d+harmA ya saM ya maM/ d+ha rmaM mok+ShA ya me d+hA bI d+ha naM dA nA ya b+huk+ta ye/ sdom brtson med?
243b2(mdo 'grel): ba na si? pu tra tshun lha tshar 'bebs so/ /du thos ba 'dzin par byed/ /mi dag sdom brtson chos kyi ched du ste/ blo dang ldan pa thar pa'i ched du chos/ /sbyin pa'i ched dang zas kyi ched du nor/ de krud+d+hyA di yo ge tsa/ 'khrud gas? ba la sogs pa de'i sbyor ba la'ang ngo/ /de sems 'khrugs pa dang
243b3(mdo 'grel): khros ba la sogs pa'i don dang sbyor ba la'ang rnam dbye bzhi pa 'jug ste/ krU rA ya krud+d+ha te/ mi de trA ya dru hya ti/ gu na ba te de a sU ya ti/ kya pra phyis pa la'ang rnam dbye lnga pa 'jug par bshad pas/ ha rmyA tpre k+Sha te /zhes te khang bzang gi steng du 'dzegs nas phyogs
243b4(mdo 'grel): su lta ba'i don no/ /de bzhin du/ A sa nA tpre k+Sha ti/ zhes te gdan la 'du pa gros? ba las 'khrug go/ ba grogs bshes la 'ku bar byed nas yon tan ldan pa la bsngags pa mi byed do/ /lta ba'i don/ /dgos pa las byung ba'i kyi gangs las khang bzangs las lta bar byed do/ /la sbyor ba la'ang bdun ba
243b5(mdo 'grel): la 'jug par bshad de/ gdan las lta'o kya ba ngas dper na tsa rma Ni dwi pi ni hi n+ta dan+ta yorhan+ti kuny+dza raM/ bA le Shu tsa ma rI han+ti simni buSh+ka la kA ha ta:/ /lpags pa'i ched du stag ni gsod par byed/ /mche ba dag gi ched du glang chen gsod/ /rnga ma rnams la g.yag ni gsod
243b6(mdo 'grel): bar byed/ /gla rtsi'i ched du gsod do dri ldan pa /de'i nang na yod di pa la yang bdun o sra pa 'jug ste/ ta su:? rke tsa tu ra(mdo 'grel): di Sha Sh+The sabta myau tsA nA da re/ ma gus ba las drug pa dang bdun ba dag go/ ma gus pa ste ngag la mi nyen pa'i don la rnam dbye drug ba dang bdun
243b7(mdo 'grel): ba gang rung 'jug ste/ ba hU mang po rnams kyi ca co rnams las rkun ma bros so/ /nAM kro Am sha tAM ga A ma ta shtso ra(mdo 'grel): ba huShwA su pa/ /da/ rtog ge pa'i nang ni dpyod ldan yong/ /sAd+hu ngan pa mang po rnams kyis smra kyang mkhas pa rang nyid lam bde ba la song ngo/ /Shu ba su ba da t+swa pi su Tha swa ya mAryo ya ti sA d+hu marga? 244a1(mdo 'grel): ba hu Shu pub? sA d+hu Shu sug? ni bA ra yat+swa pi sma ya ma nA ryo yA tya sA d+hu mArge Na/ mA tA pi tro ru da ho(mdo 'grel): pra bra dza ti pu tra(mdo 'grel): a n+yok+ta pra tha ma(mdo 'grel): gzhan las bshad pa'i dang po'o/ /don tsam dang byed po ngo bo tsam ma yin kyang kun bshad

244b1(mdo 'grel): ni tshig sdud kyi dgos pa yin no/ /yang chu'i me zhes sam de ni dka' thub can gyi chung ma zhes pa lta bu don 'gal ba rnams la ni tshig sdud kyi bya ba mi 'jug go/ /sa tsa Sha twi d+ha(mdo 'grel): de yang drug tu dbye'o/ /tshig sdud de la yang dbye ba drug tu yod de/ mi zad par gyur pa dang
244b2(mdo 'grel): des skyes bu dang/ zlas dbye dang/ 'bru mang po dang/ las 'dzin dang phyogs gnyis pa'i bsdu ba rnams yin la/ de rnams las kyang/ tshig snga phyi gnyis las snga ma gtso bor gyur pa mi zad pa'i bsdu ba/ tshig phyi ma'i don gtso bor gyur pa phyogs gnyis pa
244b3(mdo 'grel): dang/ de'i skyes bu'i bsdu ga tshig snga phyi'i brjod bya la gtso phal med pa zlas dbye dang/ las 'dzin gyi bsdu gdongs su brjod pa'i tshig de gtso bor mi 'gyur bar de dang 'brel ba'i don gzhan zhig gtso bor gyur pa 'bru mang po'i bsdu ba yin ni zhang/ tshig sdud de rnams

244b6(mdo 'grel): zad pa'i bsdu ba zhes bya zhing tshig sbyor gyi skabs mi zad pa'i rtags de dbus mthar yod kyang bsdu ba byed che sngon du 'jog pa ni phred ngas tshig gi sgrub pa zhes bya ste/ a d+hi sngon du bzhag/ a d+hi stri yamra kri tya b+ha ba ti zhes pa byung ste/ a d+hi sngon

246b3(mdo 'grel): ba ste/ de la yang spyir bsdu ba dang/ bral rta ma yin nam rta las gzhan/ ba dang gi don dang/ sbyor ba dang brel ba dang gi don dang/ gcig gcig sbyor ba dang gi don dang/ kun tu sdud pa'ang gi don dang bzhir dbye ba las/ byed po gcig gi bla ma'i bstong pa dang dbang

247a1(mdo 'grel): sbyor la rnam dbye phrad dang bcas pa phyis bas?/ rA dza pu ru Shau/ de bzhin du/ pa Tu shatsa si gupta shatsa/ si la tu guptau/ agni shtsa si mA ru ta shtsa/ si agni mA ru tau/ b+hok+tA tsa si tse b+ho kyashtsa/ si b+hok+ti b+ho kyau/ sti tsa sai pu ru Sha shtsa/ si
247a2(mdo 'grel): stri pu ru Shau/ d+ha bashtsa kha dI rashtsa/ si d+ha ba kha dI rau/ gtso bo sngon ma/ rgyal po skyes bu dag yang zlas mkhas pa dang spas ba yang/ u yig thog ma/ mkhas pa sbas pa dag mi dang rlung yang/ dbye'i bsdu ba i thog ma/ me rlung dag/ longs spyod pa po dang long spyod yang/ ri thog ma/ lo bskyod longs? spyod lab go bud med dang skyes pa las la

247a4(mdo 'grel): briha spa ti(mdo 'grel): yang agni la sogs pa'i pha rol gyi so ma la sogs pa'i sa yig dang sha yig ni Sha yig tu 'gyur bar bshad de/ agni shtsa so si dbang po dang bud bu yang ma shtsa/ zhes pa'i don la rnam dbye sogs phyis sngon ma ring po

247a7(mdo 'grel): ku shA shtsa jas pA la shA shtsa/ das zhes pa'i tshig sbyor la rnam dbye sogs phyas/ mthar gcig chig dang mad tshig yang na bar byas pas/ sha sha ku pA ri bong rtswa ku sha shing pA la sha rnams la shaM i sha sha ku sha pA la shA(mdo 'grel): dzas/ ri bdog ku sha dang bA la sha dang/ dzas

247b2(mdo 'grel): pa phyogs gnyis pa'i bsdu ba ni/ a ka twe di gu dwan+tha/ phyogs gnyis pa dang zlas dbye la gzhan dang gzhan yang/ si gcig si nyid do/ /'chad 'gyur phyogs gnyis pa'i bsdu ba dang sngar bshad pa'i zla gzhan dang gzhan sa dbye'i bsdu ba'i si pha rol dang pha rol sa ku si
247b3(mdo 'grel): phyogs gcig la rnam dbya rnams kyi gcig tshig nyid 'jug pa shas che zhing/ bsdu ba de gnyis kyi mdza' yang mang po zhig ma ning gi rtags su 'gyur ro/ /saM khyA bu rbo dwi gu grangs thog ma can ni phyogs gnyis pa'i/ /gang la'ang grangs kyi skra dang 'brel ba las grangs
247b4(mdo 'grel): kyi sgra de thog mar 'jog cing rnam dbye phrad sogs dbyi ba ni phyogs gnyis pa'i bsdu ba zhes bya'o/ /sa mA ha re ata a'i pa? dwi gu(mdo 'grel): phyogs gnyis pa la mnyam du 'dus pa'i ata la a'id go phyogs gnyis pa'i tshig sgud kyi skabs 'dir mnyam du 'dus
247b5(mdo 'grel): pa'i don can gyi bsdu ba'i mdza' ata yin na de mo rtags su byed nA a'ipa 'gyur te/ da shA nAM grA mA NAM sa mA hA ra(mdo 'grel): zhas pa'i tshig sbyor la rnam dbye rjes 'brel ba cas pa phyis mthar a'i sbyar pas/ da sha grA mI/ de bzhin du/ bany+tsa gna ya(mdo 'grel): sa ma h+ri? ta/ pany+tse

247b7(mdo 'grel): ma lnga 'dus gi ma A ma A ma/ ba lang rnams nga rnams 'dus pa'o/ /ba lang lngo 'dus ga Am/ Am/ 'bras bu rnams gsum rnam gcig tu tshogs pa/ 'jug par A bra ster te/ tri pa lwa/ 'bras bu gsum/ lnga pa 'bru mang po di bsdu ba ni ba hu bri/ tI ra n+yA rthi/ gzhan gyi don la 'bru mang po'o/ /chag dor?  rgya?
248a1(mdo 'grel): brjod pa de'i don gtso bor mi ston par de dang 'brel pa'i don gzhan zhig gtso bor ston pa ni 'bru mang po'i bsdu ba zhes bya la/ de la yang de ma yin pa'i yon tan can dang/ de'i yon tan can gnyis su yod de/ dper brjod rim pa ltar/ ba hu

251b6(mdo 'grel): ces par 'gyur te/ u apa tu bsgyur pas/ aau pa ga pa(mdo 'grel): tshig sbyor de bzhin du byas pas/ bA shiSh+Tha(mdo 'grel): gau ta ma(mdo 'grel): aNa/ ri u ra Ni/ aN la ri ura'o/ /rkyen an pha rol la mdza' i ri yig ni ur du 'gyur te/ ShaN+NAM mA trI NAM a ba tyaM/ ma rnams kyi drug rnams kyi bu/
251b7(mdo 'grel): zhes pa'i don la rnam dbye sogs phyis aN ri ba la? rdzi'i? bu/ aN aN/ i a dag gi dbyi bos rtogs mdza' i a phyis/ gnas 'jog gi bu si ga'o ta ma'i bu ur du bsgyur bas/ ma drug gi ? ste gzhon nu 'dod drug ShANmA tu re(mdo 'grel): zhes pa ste Sha Nar bsgyur ba ni la lar dzha sa'i yi ge pha rol a'em Am si la nya ma'i yi ger
252a1(mdo 'grel): si /'gyur bar bshad pas so/ /tshig sbyor de bzhin du byas pas/ dwai mA tu ra(mdo 'grel): trai mA tu ra(mdo 'grel): ata inya niShe/ drang srong ma yin pa la ata la inya'o/ /ming a yig mdza' can las drang srong ma yin pa la de'i bu brgyud kyi don la inya 'gyur te/ de ba dat+ta
252a2(mdo 'grel): sya a ba tyi/ zhes pa'i don la/ rnam dbye sogs phyis/ inya/ nya 'phel ba'i don/ ma gnyis kyi bu/ ma gsum gyi bu/ i a dag gi dbyi 'os/ brtags mdza' i e phyis pas/ dai ba dat+ti(mdo 'grel): de bzhin du/ sh+rai d+ha ri:/ N+yA ya na Na yaN+NI yA garga na DA tristri pi tri Shwa srA de shtsa/ garga naDa/ a
252a3(mdo 'grel): tri/ ngas lhas byin gyi bu/ bud med kyi pi tri swa sri la sogs pa rnams la N+ya/ A ya Na na/ e yaN NI ya yang ngo/ /garga la sogs pa rnams la N+yA dang/ na Da la sogs lhas byin gyi bu/ pa inya rnams dpal 'dzin gyi bu/ la A ya na Na dang/ a tri la sogs pa rnams la e yan
252a4(mdo 'grel): dang/ bud med kyi rtags pi tri swa sri la sogs pa rnams la NI ya rnams bu brgyud brjod pa'i rkyen du 'gyur te/ garga sya a ba tyaM/ zhes pa'i don la rnam dbye sogs phyis/ rkyen N+ya byin/ Na 'phel ba'i don/ i a dag gi dbyi'os/ a phyis pas/ gArgya:
252a5(mdo 'grel): tshig sbyor sogs de bzhin du/ byas pas/ bAt+syaM sogs dang/ nA DA yanA(mdo 'grel): tsA rA ya Na(mdo 'grel): A mu ShA yaNa(mdo 'grel): sogs ngas dang/ garga'i bu/ A tre ya(mdo 'grel): gAdge ya(mdo 'grel): kA mai ya(mdo 'grel): mA he ya(mdo 'grel): sogs dang/ bud med kyi pi tri swa sri la/ pi tu(mdo 'grel): swa su ra ba tyaM/ zhes garga'i bu/
252a6(mdo 'grel): pa'i don la/ pe tri swa srAM ya(mdo 'grel): tshig sbyor de bi'u'i bu/ N+ya bzhin/ drang srong ra Da'i bu/ drang srong spyod pa'i bu/ drang srong che ge mo'i bu/ byas pas/ rgyun shes kyi bu/ lha mo gad+g+ha'i bu/ spre'u'i bu/ sa'i bu ste mig dmar/ mA tri swa srI ya(mdo 'grel): sogs so/ /yang/ pha'i sring mo'i bu/ des 'ga' zhig tu mo rtags
252a7(mdo 'grel): las rkyen an 'jug pa'i sring mo'i buAm a ne'i bu/ par yang bshad de/ b+hU mI a batyi/ sa'i bu ste mig dmar/ zhes pa'i don la/ sa'i bu ste mig dmar/ b+hauma(mdo 'grel): aN lugpa tu twe kwa tsita/ ma'i sring mo'i bu ste sru mo'i bu/ mang po nyid la 'ga' zhig tu 'jig go/ rnam
252b1(mdo 'grel): dbye mang tshig nyid pha rol la skabs 'ga' zhig tu brgyud la sogs pa'i rkyen rnams 'jig ste/ gArgya/ dzas/ gargA(mdo 'grel): A tre ya dzas a tra ya(mdo 'grel): bai de ha/ dzas/ bi de hA(mdo 'grel): de ba te da marthe/ lha dang 'di'i don la'o/ /mchod pa lta bu lha'i don dang 'di zhes pa'i don la arTha?
252b2(mdo 'grel): 'gyur te/ in+d+ro de ba hAM Am yasya ha gi zhes pa'i don la rnam dbye sogs phyis aN byin pas/ in+d+raM ha bi/ garga'i bu rnams/ rgyun shes kyi bu rnams/ rgyal po lus 'phags kyi bu rnams/ de bzhin du/ so myo de ba tAM yasya/ sau myaM sogs lha'i don dang/ 'di'i don la dper na/ de ba dat+tArtha
252b3(mdo 'grel): mi daM/ si/ lha dbang po'i sreg rdzas gang gi/ nges/ zhes pa'i don la/ dai ba dat+taM/ zhes pa ste lhas byin gyi don du dbang po'i ched kyi sreg rdzas/ bzhag pa'i zas dang gos la sogs pa'i don no/ /lha zla ba'i ched du gang gi/ si Am/ zla ba'i ched du/ ces? Na si kwa tsit+twa yo(mdo 'grel): la lar gnyis ka la'o/ /rkyen
252b4(mdo 'grel): si/ 'di lhas byin gyi don du/ 'phel ba'i rgyu mtshan can pha rol lhas byin gyi don du/ la skabs la lar ming sngon ma dang phyi ma gnyis ka'i thog ma'i dbyangs 'phel bar byed pa yang yod de/ Agni ma ru ta karmA/ yang dngos po'i don la'ang aN sogs 'jug par
252b5(mdo 'grel): bshad pas/ su h+rid dang su b+ha ga la dngos po'i don du aN dang N+ya byin/ so so'i tshig gnyis ka'i dbyangs thog ma 'phel ba byas pas/ sau hA rdaM/ sau b+hAgyaM/ Ni to bA/ Na 'gro ba las yang mi la rlung gis las byin/ na'o/ /gong du brjod pa dang 'chad 'gyur gyi rkyen na yig
252b6(mdo 'grel): rjes 'brel 'gro ba 'phel ba'i rgyu mtshan can rnams las kyang skabs 'gar 'phel ba sogs Na 'gro ba'i cho ga rnams byed pa dang/ mdza' bshes/ skal bzang/ mi byed pa 'dam kha can du byed pa sogs yang na bar byed pa'ang yod de/ a dzo gau rya sya/ nor dang sa
252b7(mdo 'grel): gzhi ldan pa gang gi zhes pa ste dbang phyug chen po'i ming/ zhes pa'i don la rnam dbye sogs phyis/ aN 'phel ba yang na bar byas pas/ A dza ga baM/ dbang phyug chen po 'am dbang phyug gi gzhu la yang 'jug go/ a dza ga baM/ de bzhin du/ ku mu nga ku mu da'i dri dang 'dra ba'i dri gang gi/ sems sya ?
253a1(mdo 'grel): gand+ha mi ba gand+ho ya sya/ zhes pa'i don la/ N+ya kau mu da gand+hyA/ 'phel ba 'ang mkha' i dpe/ ku mu da gand+hyA/ shwA su ra syA yaM/ shwA surya grA ya(mdo 'grel): biSh+No ngas ri da/ 'phel ba'i dpe/ baiSh+Na baM/ go ri daM/ ga byaM/ ku la sya nges i se daM/ ku lyaM/ yuSh+mad/ NI ya/ twa dI
253a2(mdo 'grel): yaM/ a smad/ NI ya/ ma dI si yaM si tsa tu ra shtsa lo pa(mdo 'grel): tsa tur gyi tsa dbyi ku mu da'i dri dang ldan pa'i dri yod pa mo'u bu/ nges i dam si gyis po'i 'di/ 'phel ba'i dgo 'di gyos po'i byim/ khyab 'jug gi 'di aNa ngas si ba lang 'di N+ya 'phel ba mi byed pa'i dpe/ 'o/ /'di'i rigs/ 'phel ba mi byed pa'i dpe/ tsaM tur khyod kyi'o//
253a3(mdo 'grel): si 'phel ba mi byed pa'i dpo/ gyi sgra'i? nga'am pa des? go/ yig ni de phan gyi rkyen a dang dbyangs rkyen pha rol la dbyi bar bya ste/ tsa tu ra/ N+ya/ turyaM/ tsa tur/ NI ya/ tu rI ya(mdo 'grel): a n+ya sya da ka/ a n+ya kyi dka' o/ /a n+ya kyi sgra la de phan gyi rkyen dbyangs pha rol las daka A ga ma 'gyur te/ a n+ya la
253a4(mdo 'grel): NI ya/ daka A ga ma byin pas/ a n+ya dI yaM/ daka A ga ma a n+ya kho na la ster gyi gzhan la ni ma yin te/ ard+ha dza ra ta/ NI ya/ ard+ha dza ra dI yaM/ bzhi po rnams/ kA ra kA kri ya bzhi po rnams/ yuk+ke /byed po dang bya ba'i sbyor ba la'o/ /byed pa po dang bya ba dang byed pa sbyor ba dang/ byed pa
253a5(mdo 'grel): dang las sbyor ba dang/ byed po gzhan gyi phyir/ las dang bya ba gsum sbyor ba dang/ byed lo las dang byed pa phyed rgas pa ste dar yol/ gsum sbyor ba dang/ byed po las bya byed bzhi sbyor ba ste/ dbye ba drug po de rnams la aNa sogs sngar bshad pa'i rkyen de
253a6(mdo 'grel): rnams 'jug ste/ kudku me DA na rAk+taM bastraM/ zhes pa'i don la/ kaudku maM/ gur kum gyis btsos pa/ ma thu rA yA(mdo 'grel): ngasi a ga ta(mdo 'grel): mA thu aNa ra(mdo 'grel): grA me b+ha pa(mdo 'grel): grA mya(mdo 'grel): d+hU raM ba ha tI ti/ d+hau re ya(mdo 'grel): e yaNa/ N+ya d+hUrya:/ ke ne ye kA(mdo 'grel): ka a'i na i ya
253a7(mdo 'grel): i ka rnams so/ /gur gum gyis btsos pa'i gos/ rkyen ka dang a'i na dang i yaM dang aNa i ka ste bzhi po 'di rnams bcom brlag 'byung nam 'ongs so/ /pa si la grang na yod/ sogs? N+ya 'phang lo 'dren pa'o sto shing rta 'dran pa'i glang pa'i don la 'jug cing/ rkyen de rnams
253b1(mdo 'grel): la? thung Na 'gro ba'i ming btags te 'phel bar byed ba dang mi byed pa yang na bar byed de/ ka Na Ta b+ha ba(mdo 'grel): zhes pa'i don la rkyen ka 'phel ba yang na bar byas pas/ kAr+Na Taka(mdo 'grel): ka r+Na Ta ka(mdo 'grel): sogs dang/ grA mA dA ka tasta tra dzA two bA/ zhes pa'i don la rkyen a'i
253b2(mdo 'grel): na brA? mi na(mdo 'grel): yang na N+ya sbyar bas grA mya(mdo 'grel): de bzhin du/ sa d+ha tsa/ a'i na/ sa d+h+rI tsI na(mdo 'grel): sa mya tsa/ ngi a'i na/ yul kar+Na Tar skyes pa'am 'ongs pa/ sa mI tsI na(mdo 'grel): tirya tsa/ yi na/ ti ra shtsI yul karta Ta pa/ na(mdo 'grel): sogs dang/ ya ngasi lo si pashtsa/ si grong sde las 'ongs shing dor skyes pa nyid do//

254a7(mdo 'grel): tra yA NAM Am sa mA gsum tshogs pa/ trA? rA(mdo 'grel): zhes pa'i don la/ tre tA/ gsum tshogs gang bram za nyid dam bram za'i mtshan nyid/ bzhin du/ bram za nyid dam bram ze'i mtshan nyid/ dza nA Am nA sa skye ba tshogs pa'am 'dus pa/ mA hA si ri/ dza na tA A pa si las kyi don la'ang yaNa
254b1(mdo 'grel): 'jug par bshad de/ brAhma Na sya ras karmaM/ si zhes pa'i don la/ brAhma N+yaM/ de bzhin du/ rA dz+nya(mdo 'grel): i daM karmaM/ rgyal po'i las 'di/ rA dzyaM/ rA dza n+yaM/ na'i yang na 'os Ti dbyi ba dang mi dbyi ba yang na bar byas pa'o/ /lo hi tA de rDi di man/ lo hi ta la sogs pa la i man?

254b3(mdo 'grel): bzhin du/ a r+No b+ha des ba(mdo 'grel): si a Ni mA/ si ri ra i ma Ni/ ri'i ra i man la'o/ /rkyen i man pha rol la rtags byi dang po'i ri yig ni ra srog ldan du 'gyur te/ pri dmar po'i mtshan nyid dam dmar po nyid/ /ngas si tho rb+ha ba(mdo 'grel): zhes dmar po nyid/ pa'i don la/
254b4(mdo 'grel): pra thi mO/ de bzhin phra mo'i mtshan nyid dam phra mo nyid/ du/ TI dri/ i man/ dra Dhi mA/ si mri du/ i man/ mra di mA/ si ba horlo bo b+hA tsa ba ho(mdo 'grel): ba hu las dbyi zhing ba hu'i yang rgya che ba'i mtshan nyid de ma rgya che ba nyid/ b+hU'o/ /ba hu las pha rol gyi rkyen i man gyi i
254b5(mdo 'grel): rgya che ba'i mtshan nyid dam rgya che ba nyid/ dbyi zhing i man sogs pha rol ba hu 'ang hU brtan pa'i mtshan nyid dam brtan pa nyid/ b+hU zhes par 'jam pa'i mtshan nyid dam 'jam pa nyid/ 'gyur te/ ba ho rb+ha pa(mdo 'grel): si zhes pa'i don la/ ba hu/ i man zhes gnas pa la/ i phyis/ ba hu yang b+hU ru bsgyur bas

254b7(mdo 'grel): na? ba'i mtshan nyid dam mang po nyid/ a tu dang so'i si la 'os ring por bsgyur bas/ go dpa' yod pa'am ba lang can/ mEna/ yod na de'i mdza' a'ika sbyar bas/ go ba lang yod pa 'am ba lang can/ ma tI/ de bzhin du/ sh+rI mAn/ dbal yod pa'am dpal ldan/ sh+rI ma tI/ sogs so/ /a mi kau
255a1(mdo 'grel): ma twarthe/ ma tu'i don la a dang i ka dag go /ming las ma tu'i don te yod pa'i don brjod pa la rkyen a dang i ka dag kyang 'gyur te/ pai dza an+ti bidya ti ya sya/ zhes pa'i don la/ bai dza yan+ta(mdo 'grel): a de bzhin du/ mA yig(mdo 'grel): ika sogs so/ /mAn+to pa d+hA twa twi

255a3(mdo 'grel): dya te ya sya/ ngas zhes pa'i don la/ ba tu/ u num gyi don/ b+ha ga ba na/ ba tu de bzhin du/ d+ha nI/ nor can/ k+ShA trI/ in si daN+DI/ in si kA mI/ in si da mI/ zhi dul can/ sha mI/ in si sogs a mdza' dang/ dri Sha ba du? dwa bas? gzhi yod pa'am sa gzhi can/ hi sogs si a
255a4(mdo 'grel): skal pa yod pa gang la/ u pa d+hA na yod pa dang/ ba tu si kimpA na skal ldan nam bcom ldan nam legs ldan/ sogs? in si ma rgyal rigs can/ yig dbyug pa can/ mdza' 'dod ba can/ in si can dang/ lak+Sh+mI bAna sogs ma u pa d+hA na yod pa'i a'i za dpe mdo tsam mo/ /ta Di dI di b+hyashtsa/ ta Dita
255a5(mdo 'grel): la sogs pa rnams las kyang ngo/ /ta Dita la sogs ci ldan pa'am gang ldan pa/ pa rnams las kyang yod pa'i don la rkyen ba tu dang in dag 'gyur te/ ta dpal dang ldan pa'am phun sum tshogs pa dang ldan pa/ DitwA na/ dbang ldan/ rlung ldan/ ma ru twAn/ e tatki yat+ta db+hya(mdo 'grel): e
255a6(mdo 'grel): tad/ ki ma/ yada/ tad rnams las so/ /e tatra la sogs pa 'di rnams las tshad ston pa'i don la rkyen ba tu 'gyur te/ yadra dang tad la rkyen ba tu byin/ yat+ta do rA/ yang tad dag gi A'o/ /batu num si rkyen ba tu ba tu nu ma si/ pha rol la yang dang
255a7(mdo 'grel): tad dag gi Ti ni A ru 'gyur te/ Ti A/ si/ num byin pas/ yA gang tsam bAn/ tA de tsam bAn/ kim(mdo 'grel): kirya shtsa/ kim ni ki sta ya yang ngo/ /rkyen ba tu pha rol la kim gyi sgra ni ki ru 'gyur zhing ba tu'i ba de yang ya yig tu 'gyur te/ ji tsam ka yAn
255b1(mdo 'grel): A i shtsai ta do bA/ e tatra kyi A dang i yang na'o/ /rkyen ba tu pha rol la e tatra kyi Te A ru 'gyur zhing yang na e tatra yongs rdzogs i ru 'gyur la rkyen gyi ba yang yar 'gyur te/ e tA bAn/ de tsam/ e yAn/ tundA de ri la(mdo 'grel): tunda sogs la i la'o/ /tunda
255b2(mdo 'grel): sogs pa rnams la yod pa'i don la rkyen i la 'gyur te/ tundi la(mdo 'grel): u da ri la(mdo 'grel): sogs so/ /aaun+na tye dan+tA du ra(mdo 'grel): dan+ta las ring ba la u ra'o/ /den+ta las ring ba'am sbom pa'i don can dang ldan si num/ pa la rkyen saM num/ u ra 'gyur te/ un+na(mdo 'grel): dzas dan+tA:/ dzas
255b3(mdo 'grel): a sya/ zhes pa'i don la/ dan+tu ur ra(mdo 'grel): si/ sh+rad+d+hA derlu(mdo 'grel): lte ba can/ lto ba can/ sh+rad+d+hA la sogs pa la lu'o/ /sh+rad+d+hA la sogs pa rnams la yod pa'i don la lu rkyen du 'gyur te/ sh+rad+d+hA lu(mdo 'grel): si ni drA lu:/ kri pA lu(mdo 'grel): sogs so/ /as kyi mdza' i can dang mA yA dang
255b4(mdo 'grel): so ring po yod pa'am so sbom po yod pa'am si mthon po yod pa can/ me d+ha dang srakra rnams las yod pa'i don la rkyen ba ni pi tya ta ya sya? bcas tshig sbyor/ 'gyur bar bshad de/ ta pa swI/ dka' thub can nam sdom ldan/ mA dang can/ ya bI/ gnyid can/ brtse ba can nam brtse ldan/ me d+hA bI/ si num/ sra g+gI/ si num/ bA tsogmi
255b5(mdo 'grel): ni:/ bA ci las gmi ni'o/ /bA tsa las yod pa'i don la gmi ni rkyen du 'gyur te/ pA tsa la/ gmi ni/ rkyen gyi na'i i dang ga rjes 'brel/ /tsu'i ku dang/ tsa pa'i a as ta bas bin si num/ ba la dza ba sgyu ma can/ si num/ sogs kyis blo gros can/ 'phreng ldan nam 'phreng ba can/

255b7(mdo 'grel): de sh+ya/ de shI smra ba can/ ya rnams so/ /don gang la'ang phal cher yongs su rdzogs kyang cung zad ma tshang bas lhag ma can gyi don la rkyen/ kalpa dang/ de sh+ya dang/ de shI ya rnams smra ba ngan pa can te rdzun chen po/ 'gyur te/ a'i Sha Ta a pa ri sa mApta(mdo 'grel): sarba dz+nya(mdo 'grel): zhes pa'i don la/ cung zad yongs? su
256a1(mdo 'grel): ma rdzogs pa'i thams cad mkhyen pa/ sarba dz+nya kalpa(mdo 'grel): de bzhin du/ pa Tu de sh+ya(mdo 'grel): ka bi dai shI ya(mdo 'grel): sogs so/ /prA shaM sa yAM rU pa(mdo 'grel): kha bsgyur ba la rU pa'o/ /mi mkhas pa mkhas par rdzu ba dang/ mi shes kyang shes zer ba lta bu kha bsgyur ba'i don la rkyen rU pa

256a3(mdo 'grel): yA ka ra Na bA sha(mdo 'grel): de bzhin rdzus ma'i brda sprod mkhan po/ du/ kut+si to a b+hi Shaka/ a b+hi ShakpA sha(mdo 'grel): kut+si to bai yA ka ra No ba hu(mdo 'grel): ba hu bA sha(mdo 'grel): b+hU ta purbe tsa ra Ta/ sngon dus shes pa la tsa ra Ta'o/ /gang yang sngon gyi dus su shes pa'i brda sprod mkhan po rdzun du smra ba'am ngan par smra ba/
256a4(mdo 'grel): don la rkyen tsa ra Ta 'gyur te/ bU rbaM driSh+Ti bi bya te ya sya/ driSh+Ti tsa ra:/ smra ba ngan tha tshig rtsub can/ prA tsurya bi brda sprod mkhan po tshig ngan smra ba mang po/ kA ra bra d+hA n+yA di Shu ma ya Ta/ spyi bungs dang rnam 'gyur dang gtso bo rnams la ma yaza'o/ /ston mo byed rgyu'i zas spungs pa

257b3(mdo 'grel): po? 259a3(mdo 'grel): buM phyir? ro tshig gang gyi phyis ba'o/ /ltar gzhan las shes par bya ste/ ka ti(mdo 'grel): ka ti pa ya(mdo 'grel): sogs so/ /i ti sba ra sgasti byA kA ra Na sya sU trAt+ta d+d+hi ta dra kri yA sa mAbtA:/ zhes pa brda sprod pa dbyangs can gyi mdo las de phan gyi rab tu bya ba rnams rdzogs so// //
259a4(mdo 'grel): de nas byings las tshig tu bsgrub pa kun bshad kyi rab dza? tsam tu bya ji ma? brgyud?/ ba rnams brjod par bya ste/ d+hA to(mdo 'grel): byings las so/ /rnam dbye sbe tshon gnyis las phyi ma 'chang 'gyur ti la sogs pa 'di rnams byings kyi mthar sbyor bar shes
259a5(mdo 'grel): bar bya'o/ /b+hA di(mdo 'grel): b+hU la sogs pa'o/ /byings ni b+hU yod pa la'o zhes pa la sogs pa rnams la byings zhes bya'o/ /sa tsa tri bi d+ha(mdo 'grel): de yang dbye ba gsum mo/ /byings de la yang bdag don gyi tshig can dang gzhan don gyi tshig can dang gnyis ka'i tshig can te
259a6(mdo 'grel): dbye ba gsum du yod do/ /A nu dAt+ta dita(mdo 'grel): a nu dAt+ta dita dag gi A ta'o/ /byings gang la'ang a nu dAt+ta ste dbyangs skad gdangs dma' bar 'gro da rnams dang dra 'gro ba rnams ni Ata ces pa At+ma ne ba da ste bdag don gyi byings zhes zer ro/
259a7(mdo 'grel): nyit+sa? ri te ta shtsa u b+he/ nyita dang sra ri ta'i gnyis ka'o/ /byings gang la 'ang nya 'gro ba dang swa ri ta ste sgra skad gdangs 'bring por 'don pa 'gro ba rnams bdag don dang gzhan don gnyis pa'i tshig can gyi byings zhes zer la/ gzhan yang byings
259b1(mdo 'grel): gang la'ang bdag don dang 'brel ba'i sgrub 'bras ston pa bdag don gyi tshig can dang/ gzhan gyi don dang 'brel ba'i sgrub 'bras ston pa gzhan don gyi tshig can dang/ de dang de'i don gyi byed pa'i tshig 'jug pa ni de dang de'i tshig can zhes bya'o/ /ba ro
259b2(mdo 'grel): tonya rgya? ta/ gzhan las gzhan no/ /gong du brjod pa'i bdag don dang gnyis ka'i don can gyi mtshan nyid chad ba de las gzhan pa'i byings rnams ni gzhan don gyi tshig can gyi byings zhes bya'o/ /na ba pa rasmai ba dA ni/ dgu rnams pa rasmai ba da'o/ /rnam
259b3(mdo 'grel): dbye ti sogs brgya dang brgyad cu po la sde tshan bcu ru yod la/ sde tshan re re la'ang dgu tshan gnyis gnyis su yod pa las/ dang po dgu ni ba rasmai ba da ste gzhan don gyi tshig can gyi rnam dbye zhes bya'o/ /ba rA N+yAt+ma ne pa dA naM/ pha rol rnams At+ma ne ba
259b4(mdo 'grel): da'o/ /ba rasmai ba da las pha rol te phyi ma dgu ni At+ma ne ba da zhes bdag don gyi tshig can gyi rnam dbye zhes zer ro/ /brtam ne tibta san+ti sibtha s+tha mibba smasta yA ta yan+te sa yA the d+hwa ye ba he ma he(mdo 'grel): de ltar ba la ti ba/ ta sa/ an+ti/ sib/ thas/ tha/ mib/
259b5(mdo 'grel): pas/ mas/ te/ A te/ an+te/ se/ A the/ d+hE/ e/ ba he/ ma he'o/ /rnam dbye sde tshan bcu las 'jug bzhin ba dang bya ba shes par nus pa'i da ltar ba'i don la tipa la sogs pa bco brgyad po 'di rnams 'gyur te/ bA Ni pa'i lugs la laTa zhes zer ro//
259b6(mdo 'grel): nAmni tsa yuSh+ma di tsAsma di tsA b+ha ge(mdo 'grel): bra tha ma ma d+hye mo t+ta mA/ dang po dbus ma phyi ma rnams ming dang/ yuSh+mad/ asmad rnams kyi dbye bas so/ /ti sogs rnam dbye dgu tshan re re la'ang skyes bu dang po gsum dang dbus ma gsum dang phyi ma gsum ste
259b7(mdo 'grel): gsum mtshan gsum du yod pa las byings gang la'ang byings de dang sbyor rgyu'i nye ba'i tshig dang por 'jog rgyud de yuSh+ma da dang astad dag ma yin pa'i ming spyir khyab yin na rnam dbye dgu tshan so so'i skyes bu dang po gsum 'jug cing/ nye ba'i tshig de
260a1(mdo 'grel): yuSh+mad yin na skyes bu dbus ma gsum dang asmad yin na skyes bu phyi ma gsum 'jug go /karta ri paM tsa/ byed po la pri yang ngo/ /spyir byed pa dang sbyor ba'i bya ba'i don la paM ste pa rasmai pa da rnams 'jug pa shas che
260a2(mdo 'grel): zhing dngos po dang las kyi bya ba'i don la Ahma ne pa da rnams 'jug pa spyir btang ngo/ /de yang b+hU yod pa la'o zhes pa'i byings la brta ma na'i skyes bu dang pa'i gcig tshig tiba byin pas/ b+hu/ tipra ces gnas pa la/ a pra ka rta ri/ byed pa
260a3(mdo 'grel): po la apa'o/ /byings b+hU la sogs pa rnams la rnam dbye tipa sogs nas bzung dipa sogs kyi bar sde tshan bzhi po pha rol la byed pa po'i don du apa bi kA ra Na rkyen du 'gyur te/ apa bi kA ra Na byin/ gu Nau(mdo 'grel): yon tan no/ /rnam dbye dang
260a4(mdo 'grel): rkyen yon tan 'byung ba'i rgyu mtshan can pha rol la byings kyi mdza' yon tan du 'gyur ro/ /a pit+tA di rdi ta/ ba ti dang tA sogs ma yin pa ni dita'o/ /rnam dbye pa yig 'gro ba rnams dang 'og nas 'bung ba'i tA tA rau sogs ma yin pa'i rkyen
260a5(mdo 'grel): rnams la ni nga 'gro ba'i ming can zhes zer te dgos pa ni dbyings la yon tan mi byed pa'i don no/ /kdi tya tyu si/ us ma yin pa'i kita dita la'o/ /'og nas 'byung ba'i rnam dbye us ma yin pa'i kra 'gro ba'i ming can dang nga? 'gro ba'i ming
260a6(mdo 'grel): can rnams pha rol la byings la yon tan 'byung ba ma yin no/ /de sa na 'dir apa bi kA ra Na pa 'gro ba yin pas/ byings la yon tan/ pa de'i don/ o apa sogs kyis bsgrubs pas/ b+ha ba ti/ gnyis tshig la/ b+ha ba ta(mdo 'grel): mang
260a7(mdo 'grel): tshig la'ang b+hU b+ha bar bsgrub tshul sogs gong ltar byas pas/ b+ha ba/ an+ti zhes gnas pa la/ a de/ ata kyi a dang e'o/ /byings kyi mdza' i atra ni rkyen a yig dang e yig pha rol la dbyi ? bar bya ste/ byings dag ? mdza' i
260b1(mdo 'grel): a phyis pas/ b+ha ban+ti/ de bzhin du skyes bu dbus ma gsum la/ b+ha ba si/ b+ha ba tha/ b+ha ba tha/ skyes bu phyi ma'i gcig tshig la/ b+ha ba/ mi pa ces gnas pa la/ ba mo rA/ ba ma dag la A'o/ /rnam dbye ti sogs pa yig dang ma yig thog ma can
260b2(mdo 'grel): pha rol la byings rnams yod/ mdza' i a thung ni A yig ring por yod/ dag yod/ rnams yod/ 'gyur te/ b+ha bA mi/ de bzhin du gnyis tshig dang mang tshig la/ b+ha bA ba(mdo 'grel): b+ha bA ma(mdo 'grel): gong du bshad pa ltar de rnams nye ba'i tshig dang sbyor tshul ni/ ming dang skyes
260b3(mdo 'grel): bu dag po gsum rim bzhin sbyar bas/ si sa rA dza d+hArmi ko b+ha ba ti/ aau tau rA dza aau nau d+hArmi kau b+ha ba ta(mdo 'grel): yod/ te rA dzA no d+hArmi kA b+ha bin+ta/ an+ti/ dag yod/ rnams yod/ yuSh+mad dang skyes bu dbus ma rnams sbyar ba'i dpe ni/ twaM sA d+hurba ba
260b4(mdo 'grel): siNa sipa yu bAM sA d+hu b+ha ba tha(mdo 'grel): thas/ de rgyal po chos dang ldan par yod do/ /si yU si yAM tipa de dag rgyal po dag chos ldan yod/? d+hu b+ha aau ba tas/ thu/ dzas dzas skyes dzas da rnams rgyal po rnams chos ldan rnams yod/ /bu phyi ma asmad dang sbyor ba'i dpe ni/ a hA mat+ma pad+d+hi bA mi/ si A si bA mAt+ma
260b5(mdo 'grel): byed legs par yod/ aau khyod dag lags par yod pa dang/ /bi dau b+ha bA ba(mdo 'grel): ba ya mAt+ma dzas/ bi da(mdo 'grel): b+ha bA khyod rnams legs pa rnams yod/ ma(mdo 'grel): ba sogs so/ /a bya ba d+hA nAny+tsa pu ru Sha bi sha Sha(mdo 'grel): par ma chad pa las kyang da ni bdag nyid rig par yod/ si/ si dang? dag bdag nyid rig pa dag yod/ aau skyes
260b6(mdo 'grel): bu'i bye brag go ming dang yuSh+mad dang o asma bas da dzas gsum re dzas des rnams bdag nyid rig pa rnams yod/ re mas/ la skyes bu dang po dang dbus ma dang phyi ma gsum sbyor tshul gong du bshad pa ltar yin las ming dang yuSh+mad asmad gsum ga
260b7(mdo 'grel): sgrigs pa dang gnyis sgrigs sogs bar ma chad pa las kyang de gsum gtso phal gyi skyes bu gsum po la'ang gtso phal bye brag yod la/ de yang gsum ga sgrigs pa la asmad gtso bas skyes bu phyi ma dang/ gnyis sgrigs pa las? 
261a1(mdo 'grel): a smad yod na de gtso bas phyi ma dang/ a smad med pa'i gnyis sgrigs la yuSh+mad gtso che bas skyes bu dbus ma 'jug ste/ sa tsa twaM tse sA d+hu b+ha ba tha(mdo 'grel): zhes pa a smad med na yuSh+mad gtso che bas skyes bu dbus
261a2(mdo 'grel): ma'i gnyis tshig thas byung ba lta bu'o/ /bi d+hi saM b+ha ba na yo(mdo 'grel): yA tyA tAM/ yu syA syA tAM/ yA ta yAM yA ba yA me ta yA tA mI ra nI tha sI yA thA mI d+hwa mI ye ba de dang khyod kyang legs par yod/ hI ma hi/ cho ga 'byung ba'i gnas dag las/ yAta/ yA tA ma
261a3(mdo 'grel): yus/ yAs/ yA hAM yA ta/ yAM yA ba yA ma/ a'i ta/ a'i yA tAM a'i ra na/ a'i tha sa/ a'i yA thAM a'i d+hwaM/ a'oM yA a'i ba hi a'i ma ha rnams so/ /cho ga zhes pa bya ba'i don la nye bar ston pa dang 'byung ba'i gnas te rtogs pas shes pa'i
261a4(mdo 'grel): bya ba'i don la rnam dbye yAta la sogs pa 'di rnams 'jug ste/ pA Ni pa'i lugs la ling zer ro/ /de yang gong bzhin/ b+hU b+ha bar bsgrub pa la/ pa rasmai pa de'i skyes bu dang po'i gcig tshig yA ta sbyar/ b+ha ba/ yAta ces
261a5(mdo 'grel): gnas pa la/ yA/ a la ya'i'o/ /byings a yig mdza' las pha rol gyi rnam dbye'i yA yig ni a'i ru 'gyur te/ yA a'i/ A i la er bsgyur bas/ b+ha bata/ de bzhin du gnyis tshig la/ b+ha be tAM/ mang tshig la/ b+ha ba/
261a6(mdo 'grel): yusa/ zhes gnas pa la yus iTa yus la ibu'o/ /a yig mdza' las pha rol gyi yus la iTa A ga ma 'gyur te/ i Ta byin/ Ta gnas don/ a i la e/ b+ha be yu(mdo 'grel): skyes bu dbus ma gsum la/ b+ha be(mdo 'grel): b+ha be hAM/ b+ha be ta/ skyes bu phyi ma'i gcig
261a7(mdo 'grel): tshig/ /b+ha ba/ yAM zhes gnas pa la/ yAd mi yaM/ yA ma i laM mo/ /a yig mdza' las pha rol gyi rnam dbye yAM ni i yaM du 'gyur te/ b+ha be yaM/ gnyis tshig dang mang tshig la/ b+ha be ba/ b+ha be ma/ de rnams nye ba'i
261b1(mdo 'grel): tshig dang sbyar ba'i dpe ni/ shi Sh+yo gu ru shu sh+ru Sha ko b+ha be te/ yata/ ces pa cho ga 'byung ba'i dpe dang/ b+ha be yAta da sau be da pA ra go brAhma na twA ngi ti saM b+hA ba naM/ zhes pa 'byung ba'i gnas kyi dpe'o/ /a shI(mdo 'grel): bre da Na yo/ tu b+hA man+tu hi taM hA ni
261b2(mdo 'grel): pA ? bA maptA mA hA man+tAM spA thAM/ d+hwA mai b+ha ba hai pA ma slob mas bla ma bsten pa'i bya ba byed/ he ba/ shis byed dang byed du 'jug pa 'di ltar khyod rig byed kyi pha rol tu son na bram ze'o/ /dag la tu pra hAM an+tu/ hi taM ta/ A nipa A ba pa/ A maba/ tAM A tAM an+tA ma/ swa A thA ma/
261b3(mdo 'grel): d+hwam/ i pa A ba hai pa rnams so/ /ma thob pa thob par byed pa sogs bkra shis pa'i don dang 'dod pa dang mthun par bskul ba sogs byed du 'jug pa'i don la tupa la sogs pa 'di rnams 'gyur zhing/ pA Ni pa'i lugs la logs zer ro/ /de
261b4(mdo 'grel): yang b+hU b+ha bar bsgrub tshul gong ltar la/ skyes bu dang po'i gcig tshig la/ b+ha ba/ tu pa ces gnas pa la/ shis byed kyi don la skyes bu dang po'i gcig tshig tu ba dang skyes bu dbus ma'i gcig tshig hi gnyis ni tA tang
261b5(mdo 'grel): zhes par bsgyur ba dang mi bsgyur ba 'dam kha can du bshad pas/ b+ha ba tu/ b+ha ba tuta/ gnyis tshig dang mang tshig la/ b+ha ba hAM/ b+ha ban+tu/ skyes bu dbus ma'i gcig tshig la/ b+ha ba hi zhes gnas pa la/ a ta(mdo 'grel): ata la so/ /a
261b6(mdo 'grel): yig mdza' las pha rol gyi hi ni dbyi bar bya ste/ hi dbyi ba dang shis byed kyi don la tA had du bsgyur ba yang na bar byas pas/ b+ha ba/ b+ha ba tA ta/ gnyis tshig dang mang tshig la b+hag taM/ b+ha ba to/ skyes bu phyi ma gsum la/ b+ha bA ni/ b+ha bA
261b7(mdo 'grel): ba/ b+ha bA ma/ de rnams nye ba'i tshig dang sbyar ba'i dpe ni/ A yuSh+manb+ha ba shis byed kyi dang/ tu/ khyod tshe dang ldan par gyur cig/ A yuSh+mAnb+ha ba tAta/ a klog cing 'don pa de nyid mdzod cig dge ba'o/ d+hya ya nA yo da dya byed du 'jug pa'i dpe/ to b+ha ba sau mya/ an dya ta na
262a1(mdo 'grel): A dI te diptA mamsi pAM tA mi bba ma ta nA tA ma ta thA sAthAM d+hwa mi ba rni na hi/ de ring ma yin pa'i 'das pa la/ dipa tAm aTa/ sipa tam ta/ a mipa/ ba ma/ tan A tAma/ an+ta/ thAs/ A thA ma/ d+hwaM/ i ba hi ma hi rnams so//
262a2(mdo 'grel): de ring ma yin pa'i 'das pa ste dus 'das pa yin pa la 'das nas yun ring mo song ba'i don la dipa la sogs pa'i rnam dbye 'di rnams 'gyur te/ bA Ni pa'i lugs la rang zer ro/ /rnam dbye de rnams kyi dipa 'ang sipa dang miba rnams kyi ba
262a3(mdo 'grel): yig yon tan gyi don dang i yig brjod po'i don/ tan gyi na yig dgos pa dang bcas pa'i rjes 'brel yin no/ /b+hu b+ha bar bsgrub tshul sngar ltar byas pas/ b+ha ge di pa ces gnas pa la/ dI bA dA baTa/ dipa sogs la aTa 'o/ /rnam dbye dipa sogs pha rol
262a4(mdo 'grel): la de rnams sbyor rgyu'i byings de la aTa A ga ma ster bar bya ste/ aTa byin gnas med pa la yang na 'os/ nga nyid dang ta 'adam kha can du byas pas/ a b+ha pa bada/ a b+ha ba da/ de bzhin du bsgrubs pas/ gnyis tshig dang mang tshig la/ a b+ha ba tAM/
262a5(mdo 'grel): a b+ha ban/ skyas bu dbus ma gsum la/ a b+ha ba(mdo 'grel): a b+ha pa taM/ a b+ha ba ta/ skyes bu phyi ma gsum la/ a b+ha baM/ /a b+ha bA ba/ a b+ha pA ma/ de rnams nye ba'i tshig dang sbyar ba'i dpe ni/ hyonya b+ha bata twatpu tra(mdo 'grel): sogs so/ /de nas brta ma nal
262a6(mdo 'grel): sogs pa de rnams kyi At+ma ne pa da rnams byings dang sbyor tshul ni/ e d+ha 'phel ba la'o zhes pa'i byings la/ brta ma na'i At+ma na pa da'i skyes bu dang po'i gcig tshig ste/ byings kha sang byung ngo khyod kyi bu/ mdza' i a brjod don/ byed pa po
262a7(mdo 'grel): la zhes pas/ apa pi kA ra Na byin/ e d+ha te/ gnyis tshig sogs kun la apa bi kA ra Na sbyar ba'i e d+ha zhes pa'i bar gong bzhin bsgrubs pas/ e d+ha/ A te zhes gnas pa la A dA tha i/ Ata A tha'i i'o/ /a yig mdza' 
262b1(mdo 'grel): las pha rol gyi Ata dang A tha ste ta yig dang tha yig dag dang 'brel pa'i A ni i ru 'gyur te/ e d+he te/ mang tshig la/ e d+han+te/ de bzhin du skyes bu dbus ma gsum la/ e d+ha se/ e d+ha the/ e d+ha d+h+re/ skyes bu phyi ma gsum la/ a d+he/ e
262b2(mdo 'grel): d+hA ba he/ e d+hA ma he/ de rnams nye ba'i tshig dang sbyar ba'i dpe ni/ d+harmA de d+ha te o de rA dzyaM/ cho ga dang 'byung ba'i don gyi At+ma ne pa da rnams sbyor ba'i dpe ni apa bi kA ra Na ster ba sogs gong ltar bsgrubs pas/ skyes bu dang po gsum la/ e d+he
262b3(mdo 'grel): ta/ e d+he yA tAM/ e d+he ran/ skyes bu dbus ma gsum la/ e d+he tha(mdo 'grel): chos kyi mtho gyur da lta rgyal po/ e d+he yA thAM/ e d+he d+hwaM/ skyes bu phyi ma gsum la/ e d+he ya/ e d+he ba hi/ e d+he ma hi/ nye ba'i tshig dang sbyar ba'i dpe ni/ d+harma ta(mdo 'grel): sA d+hu re d+he ta/ a'ita/ shis
262b4(mdo 'grel): byed dang byed du 'jug pa'i don gyi A t+ma ne pa da rnams sbyor tshul ni/ e d+ha ra bsgrubs pa sogs gong bzhin byas pas skyes bu dang po gsum la/ e d+ha tAM/ e d+he tAM/ e d+ha n+tAM/ dbus ma gsum la/ e d+ha swa/ chos dang ldan pa las lags pa 'phel lo//
262b5(mdo 'grel): e d+he thAM/ a twa d+hwaM/ phyi ma gsum la/ e d+hai/ e d+hA ba hai/ e d+hA ma he/ de ring ma yin pa'i 'das pa'i don gyi At+ma ne pa da sbyor tshul ni/ e d+ha/ tan zhes gnas pa la/ dib sogs la aTa 'os aTa A ga ma byin/ swa rA de(mdo 'grel): dbyangs
262b6(mdo 'grel): thog ma las so/ /rnam dbye di pa la sogs pa pha rol la de sbyor yul gyi byings de'i thog ma dbyangs rkyang pa yin na dbyangs de la slar yang aTa A ga ma ster bar bya ste/ slar yang aTa byin rim bzhin 'tshams sbyar bas/ i d+ha ta/
262b7(mdo 'grel): gnyis tshig dang mang tshig la/ e d+he tAM/ i d+han+ta/ dbus ma gsum/ la e d+ha thA:/ i d+he thAM/ i d+ha d+hwaM/ phyi ma gsum la/ i d+he/ i d+hA ba hi/ i d+hA mahi/ de bzhin du/ a'ik+Sha lta ba la'o zhes pa'i byings la brta ma na sogs kyi At+ma
263a1(mdo 'grel): ne ba da rnams sbyar/ chog sngon ma rnams dang 'dra bar bsgrubs pas/ brta ma na'i skyes bu gsum la rim pa bzhin/ a'ik+Sha te/ a'ik+She te/ a'ik+Shan+te/ a'ik+Sha se/ a'ik+She the/ a'ik+Sha d+hwe/ a'ik+ShE/ a'ik+ShA ba he/ a'ik+ShA ma he/ cho ga dang 'byung ba'i
263a2(mdo 'grel): don gyi skyes bu gsum la/ a'ik+She ta/ a'ik+She yA tAM/ a'ik+She ran/ a'ik+She tha(mdo 'grel): a'ik+She yA thI/ a'ik+She d+hwaM/ a'ik+She ya/ a'ik+She bahi/ a'ik+She ma hi/ shis byed dang byed du 'jug pa'i don gyi skyes bu gsum la/ a'ik+Sha tAM/ a'ik+She tAM/ a'ik+Sha d+hAM/ a'ik+Sha spa/ a'ikA thAM/
263a3(mdo 'grel): a'ik+Sha d+hwaM/ a'ik+She/ a'ik+ShA pa he/ a'ik+Sha ma hai/ de dang ma yin pa'i 'das pa'i don gyi skyes bu gsum la/ ik+Sha ta/ ik+She tAM/ ik+Shan+ta/ ik+She thA(mdo 'grel): ik+She thAM/ ik+She d+hwaM/ ek+Sha/ ik+ShA ba hi/ ik+ShA ma hi/ sogs mdza' yas so/ /de nas gnyis ka'a tshig
263a4(mdo 'grel): can gya dpe na Da pa tsa Sha 'tshed pa la'o zhes pa'i dbyings la rnam dbye rnams kyi pa rasmai pa dang/ At+ma ne pa da gnyis ka 'jug ste byings kyi Du dang Sha dgos pa dang bcas pa'i rjes 'bel tsa'i a spa ri ta ste gnyis ka'i tshig can yin pa'i don
263a5(mdo 'grel): te/ rjes 'brel rnams phyis/ apa bi kA ra Na ster ba sogs cho ga thams cad b+hu dang e d+ha'i skabs dang 'dra bas/ brtam na laTa'i pa rasmai pa de'i skyes bu gsum la rim pa bzhin/ pa tsa ti/ pa tsa ta(mdo 'grel): pa tsan+ti/ pa tsa si/ pa tsa tha(mdo 'grel): pa tsa tha/ pa tsA mi
263a6(mdo 'grel): pa tsA ba(mdo 'grel): pa tsA ma(mdo 'grel): cho ga dang 'byung ba'i don gyi ling gi skyes bu gsum la/ pa tsa ta/ pa tse tAM/ pa tse yu(mdo 'grel): pa tsa(mdo 'grel): pa tse te/ pa tse ta/ pa tse yi/ pa tse ba/ pa tse ma/ shis byed loTa'i skyes bu gsum la/ pa tsa tu/ pa tsa hAta/ pa tsa tAM/ pa tsan+tu/ pa tsa/ pa
263a7(mdo 'grel): tsa hA ha/ pa tse taM/ pa tsa ta/ pa tsA ni/ pa tsA pa/ pa tsA ma/ de ring ma yin pa ling gi skyes bu gsum la/ a pa tsata/ a pa tsa tAM/ a pa tsan/ a pa tsa(mdo 'grel): a pa tsa taM/ a pa tsa/ a pa tsA ba/ a pa tsA ma/ yang At+ma ne pa da rnams sbyar bas brta ma na
263b1(mdo 'grel): laDa la/ pa tsa te/ pa tse te/ ba tsan+te/ pa tsa se/ pa tse the/ pa tsad+he/ pa tse/ pa tsA ba he/ pa tsA ma he/ cho ga dang 'byung ba ling la/ pa tse ta/ pa tse yA tAM/ ba tse ra na/ pa tse tha(mdo 'grel): pa tse yA thAM/ pa tse d+hwaM/ pa tse ya/ pa tse pa hi/ pa tse ma hi/ shis byed loTa la/ pa tsa tAM/ ba tse
263b2(mdo 'grel): tAM/ pa tsan+tAM/ pa tsa sba/ ba tse thAM/ pa tsa d+hwi/ pa tsai/ pa tsA ba he/ ba tsA ma hai/ de ring ma yin pa lang la/ a pa tsa ta/ a pa tse tAM/ a pa tsan+ta/ a pa tsa thA(mdo 'grel): a pa tsa thAM/ a pa tsa d+hwaM/ a pa tse/ a ba tsA ba hi/ a pa tsA ma hi/ sogs te byings bdag
263b3(mdo 'grel): don can la Atam ne pa da dang gzhan don can la pa rasmai pa da dang gnyis ka'i tshig can la gnyis ka sbyor tshul rnams rigs 'gre ste shes par bya'o// //de nas ad la sogs pa apa bi kA ra Na 'jig pa rnams kyi cho ga rnams
263b4(mdo 'grel): bshad par bya ste/ a dA derlu ka/ ada la sogs pa rnams las 'jig go/ byings ada la sogs po'i sde las pha rol gyi byed pa po'i don can gyi a pa bi kA ra Na ni 'jig ste/ a da za ba la'o zhes pa'i byings la brta man sogs kyi pa rasmai pa
263b5(mdo 'grel): da rnams sbyar/ apa bi kA ra Na byin de 'jig /kha sa la dzha sa rnams kyi tsa ba'i sogs kyis bsgrubs pas/ brta man laTa'i skyes bu gsum la/ at+ti/ za bar byed/ at+ta(mdo 'grel): a dan+ti/ at+si(mdo 'grel): at+tha/ admi/ adwa(mdo 'grel): adma(mdo 'grel): cho ga dang 'byung ba ling gi/
263b6(mdo 'grel): skyes bu gsum la/ a dyAtra/ a dyA tAM/ a dyu/ a dyA(mdo 'grel): adyA tAM/ a dyA ta/ a dyA/ a pyAM pa/ a dyA ma/ shis byed lo Ta'i skyes bu dang po gsum la/ a d+hu/ a tAta/ at+tI/ a dan+tu/ skyes bu dbus ma'i gcig tshig la/ ad hi zhes gnas pa la/ dza
263b7(mdo 'grel): sA d+d+hi rhe(mdo 'grel): tsa sa las hi'i d+hi'o/ /byings dza sa so sor bsdu ba'i pha rol gyi rnam dbye hi ni d+hi ru 'gyur te/ hi d+hir bsgyur ba dang/ /shis byed kyi don la tA had du bsgyur pas yang na bar byas pas/ ad+d+hi tra/ gnyis tshig dang mang tshig la/ at+taM/ at+ta?
264a1(mdo 'grel): skyes bu phyi ma gsum la/ a dA ni/ a dA pa/ a dA ma/ de ring ma yin ba lang la/ ang la sogs pa'i pha rol gyi ri ba dang si bral aTa A ga ma ster par bshad pas/ dipa sipra gnyis la aTa dang/ dipa sogs la

264a4(mdo 'grel): 'gyur te/ brta ma na'i skyes bu dang po'i gcig tshig dang gnyis tshig la/ she te/ sha yA te/ mang tshig la/ she/ an+te zhes gnas pa la/ shI donyan+to ruTa/ shI las an+ta la ruTa'o/ /byings shIng las pha rol gyi rnam dbye at+ma ne pa
264a5(mdo 'grel): da'i an+ta rnams la ruTA A ga ma 'gyur te/ ruTa byin/ Ta gnas don/ u brjod don/ A tonya to da na ta(mdo 'grel): ata ma yin pa la ata kyi an+ta ata'o/ /byings yata mdza' ma yin pa nyes pha rol gyi Ata te rnam dbya At+ma ne pa da'i san+ta rnams ni

264b3(mdo 'grel): a bA dA pI pi ti ?/ ta sa ma pa 'gro ba las a pa sngon ma la a'i'o/ /byings brU la rnam dbyai ti sogs ta yig dang sa yig dang ma yig dang po can ba yig 'gro ba'i ming can rnams pha rol las apa sngon du byung ba'i yul la a'i rkyen du 'gyur zhing/

264b6(mdo 'grel): bU ba(mdo 'grel): bU ma(mdo 'grel): de bzhin du/ At+ma ne ba da rnams la/ brU te/ brU bA te/ brU She brU bA the/ brU d+hwe/ brU be/ brU ba he/ brU me he/ brU nya'i lus 'gyur gzhan ni/ brU ba A ha shtsa bany+tsa naM/ brUI Aha ste lnga po rnams kyang ngo/ /ti sogs rnam dbye dang po lnga pha rol la byings brU ni

267b5(mdo 'grel): rnams sbyor te/ brta ma na'i skyes bu dang po'i gcig tshig la/ dipa/ tipa ces gnas pa la/ di pA derya(mdo 'grel): dipA la sogs pa la ya'o/ /byings diba la sogs pa'i sde tshan rnams la byed pa po'i don gyi apa bi kA ra Na'i yul la ya bi kA ra Na 'jug ste ya bi kA ra Na sbyar/

271b1(mdo 'grel): byings la'ang cho ga thams cad de dang 'dra bar bsgrubs pas/ buSh+NA ti/ puSh+NI yA ta/ puSh+NA tu/ puShA naNa/ a puSh+NA ta sogs so/ /muSha brku ba la'o zhes pa'i byings la'ang/ muSh+NA ti/ muSh+NI yA ta/ muSh+NA tu/ mu ShA Na/ a muSh+NA tra sogs so/ /de ltar aba bi kA ra na

271b4(mdo 'grel): las kyi rab du byed pa rnams bshad par bya ste/ Adb+hu bi karma Ni/ dngos po dang las la A ta'o/ /byings las dang bcas pa rnams la las kyi don dang las med pa rnams la dngos po'i don du rnam dbye At+ma ne pa da rnams 'jug cing dngos po'i
271b5(mdo 'grel): don la de rnams kyi gcig tshig kho na 'jug la/ nyer bsgyur gyi stobs kyis bsgyur ba la ni der ma nges so/ de yang byings las bcas dang las med kyi dbye ba ni/ byings nges byed pa'i tshig gi don kho na brjod pa ni las med pa dang/ lag
271b6(mdo 'grel): dang byed tshig gnyis ka'i don brjod pa de las bcas pa'i byings zhes grags pa las/ byings las med pa ni b+hu dang/ e d+ha dang/ A sa dang/ shIng la sogs ba ste/ ji skad du/ la? dzdzA sat+tA s+thi ti dzA ga ra Ni khrid+d+hi k+Sha ya b+ha ya dzI bi ta ma raM/ /sha ya
271b7(mdo 'grel): na kri DA ru tsi dAM b+hya rthaM d+hA tu ga Ni ha ma karma ka mA hu:/ /ngo tsha yod pa gnas pa me la tshe dang/ 'phel ba zang pa 'jig pa 'tsho ba dang/ nyal dang rtsed mo'o da? dang 'bar ba'i don/ /byings kyi tshogs rnams las med par bshad do/ /zhes pa ste ngo tsha
272a1(mdo 'grel): sogs don bcu gnyis po de rnams kyis don can gyi byings rnams la ni las med pa zhes bya zhing/ de rnams las gzhan ba rnams las dang bcas pa'o/ /dngos po'i mtshan nyid ni/ ji skad du/ sanmA? traM b+hA ba ling+gaM syA da? spri? dang? yats+tsha kAra? kai:/ /d+ha twA hwa:?
272a2(mdo 'grel): ke ba laM shud+d+he b+ha ba i tya b+hi d+hI ya te/ yod tsam dngos po'i rtags su 'gyur/ /gang yang byed can rnams ma reg/ byings don rkyang pa dag pa ni/ de la dngos por mngon par brjod/ /ces te byed can drug po gang dang yang ma sbyar ba/ dngos po yod pa tsam ston pa ni
272a3(mdo 'grel): dngos po'i don zhes bya'o/ /yak+tsa tyurSha/ bzhi po la yaka'o/ /byings las rnam dbye brta ma na sogs sde tshan dang po bzhi po pha rol la dngos po dang las kyi don la yaka rkyen du 'gyur te/ ga yig byings la yon tan 'gog pa'i don yin pas dbyi ba
272a4(mdo 'grel): sogs kyis bsgrubs pas/ b+hU yata b+ha ba tA/ e d+hya te d+hArmi ka(mdo 'grel): A sya te u pA sa ne/ /shIng gi yaka pha rol la a'i a yang du bsgyur bar bshad pas/ a'i ya yang/ nga dang ya'i a rjes 'brel yin pas phyis pas/ shayya te sh+ru dre Na/ yang skabs la
272a5(mdo 'grel): lar byings las med pa la'ang can khyod yan/ chos dang ldan pa 'phel/ nye ba'i gdan la gnas/ ltar bsgrub pa yang yod la/ de yang nye bar sgyur sngon du byung na ni nyer bsgyur gyi dbang gis las med las can der las can las med du bsgyur ba dang/ gcig tshig tsal? bar byed da dmangs rigs
272a6(mdo 'grel): kho na 'jug pa la gnyis tshig mang tshig thams cad sbyor ba sogs sna tshogs yod de/ byings las nyer bsgyur stobs che bas nyer bsgyur gyis bsgyur 'gro bas dper na/ hA ra 'phrog pa la 'jug kyang nyer bsgyur kyis bsgyur bas/ bi tU da/ A? tA ra/
272a7(mdo 'grel): saM tsA ra/ khongs su sdud pa/ pra ti hA ra 'joms pa/ sogs byings kyi don gzhan du 'gyur 'gro ba ltar ste/ nyer bsgyur gyis dbang gis/ su kha ma nu b+hU yang rdza pos bde ba rjes su myong bar byed/ te swA ma nA/ zhes pa lta bu'o/ /las bcas la las kyi don du gnas? su?/ bras?
272b1(mdo 'grel): yakra sbyar ba'i dpe ni/ kaTa(mdo 'grel): kri ya ta kA ru ke Na/ twaM du khI kri ya se/ rA gau bi rA gai(mdo 'grel): su khya haM kri ye/ a ya ki/ a yakra la'o/ /byings mdza' i di ta ni rkyen a da? ka pha rol la ring du 'gyur te/ nga yig bar 'tshams gcod pa'i don de 'og nas 'byung ba'i ya la'o

272b3(mdo 'grel): dri ya te/ h+raM? nya 'phrog pa la'o zhes pa'i byings la/ h+ri la te d+ha na ta ska re Na/ rI ta ira/ rIta ida? la/ /rkyen ya yig pha rol la byings mdza' i rIta? ni ida du 'gyur te/ twI mchod pa dang/ rgyal pa la'o zhes pa'i byings la ya ka/ rIta id du bsgyur bas/ tIta? ya? ta? zhes gnas

'o zhes
272b5(mdo 'grel): pa'i byings la/ hU ya te a giM btau/ dA di ming(mdo 'grel): dA sogs kyi i'o/ /byings Du dAnya la sogs pa'i A yig ni rkyen kra dang dra 'gro ba'i ming can pha rol la i ru 'gyur te/ Du dAnya sbyin pa la'o zhes pa'i mo? pa? ga? rnams gsog par byed/ byings la yika?/ A i/

276a1(mdo 'grel): ha sa gzhan rnams dbyi bar bya ste/ ru gong ma phyis/ ku dang ha'i cu 'os ka tsa/ i ra sogs kyis ring po/ ku i la zhes pas sa Shar bsgyur bas/ tsi kIrSha zhes gnas pa la/ kA sa zhes pas Am sbyor bas so/ kyis/ bsgrubs pas/ tsi kIrShAM tsa kA ra/ tsi kIrShA mA sa tsi kI rShhAM ba b+hU ba sogs
276a2(mdo 'grel): so/ /chog de bzhin du byas pas/ b+hudza skyong ba la sto zas g.yo ba la'ang ngo zhes pa la/ bu b+huk+ShAM tsa kA ra/ bu b+huk+ShA mAs/ pu b+huk+ShAM ba b+hU ba sogs so/ /nA mno ya AtsE sya/ ming la ya ste a'i yang a'i'o/ /ming las bdag gi 'dod pa'i don la/ bdag gi 'dod pas byed da? sngon byas so/ /ya rkyan du 'gyur
276a3(mdo 'grel): zhing ya pha rol la ming mdza' i a yang a'i ru 'gyur la/ Am sogs kyang sbyar par bya ste/ pu tra la/ ya mang mdza' i a Ad la Am sogs sbyar bas/ putrI yAM tsa kAr/ pu trIyA mA sa/ puM trAM yAM ba b+hU ba sogs so/ /du pa tsaSha 'tshed pa la/ bdag gi 'dod pa los 'os/ rkyen sa/ gnyis
276a4(mdo 'grel): brjod/ /sngon ma'i ha sa dang po lhag po 'os/ /tsa gong ma phyis/ pa pa tsa/ sa zhes gnas pa la/ ya(mdo 'grel): sa/ sa la a a'i'o/ /rkyen sa pha rol la byings gnyis brjod pa'i dang po'i a yig ni i yig tu 'gyur sngon 'byung ba'i bu/ /te/ a i/ tsu'i ku dang ku i la zhes pas/ pi pak+Sha zhe 'grug
276a5(mdo 'grel): pa la Am sogs sbyar bas/ bi pak+ShAM tsa kA ra/ bi pak+ShAM mA sa/ pi pak+ShAM pa b+hU ba sogs so/ /bar+Na rigs brjod pa la'o zhes pa la/ drur? sogs k+kyis nyi/ kAs zhes pas Am i la yon tan sogs kyis/ bar+Na yI tsa kA ra/ bar+Na ya mA sa/ bar+Na yAM ba b+hU pa sogs so/ /de bzhin du ba d+ha'i tshang bar 'o zhes pa la nyi Am
276a6(mdo 'grel): sbyor ba sogs kyis/ bad+ha yAM tsakre/ ba d+ha yAmA se/ ba d+ha yAM ba b+hU pe sogs dang yang ba d+ha la bdag gi 'dod pa'i don gyis sbyar gnyis brjod pa sogs kyis bsgrubs pas/ /bi d+ha t+sAM tsa kre/ bi b+hat+sAM ba b+hU ba sogs so/ /byings b+hI hu b+h+ri hTAi rnams kyi rkyen Am sogs pha rol la gnyis su brjod pa dang/ byings de rnams

276b1(mdo 'grel): ma sbyar pa'i phyogs ya/ bi b+hA ya/ bi b+hya tu/(mdo 'grel): bi b+hyu:/ bi b+ha yitha/ bi b+he tha/ bi b+hya thu(mdo 'grel): bi b+hya/ bi b+hA ya/ bi b+ha ya/ bi b+hyaM/ bi b+hyi ma/ de bzhin du hu sbyin pa dang za ba la'o zhes pa la/ Am sogs sbyar ba'i phyogs la/ dzu ha bA tsa kA ra/ dzu ha bA mA sa/ dzu ha bAm ba b+hu ba sogs dang/ Amma? ma sbyar ba'i
276b2(mdo 'grel): phyogs la/ dzu hA ba/ dzu hu ba tu(mdo 'grel): dzu hu bu(mdo 'grel): dzu ho tha/ dzu ha bi tha/ dzu hu ba thu(mdo 'grel): dzu hu ba/ dzu hA ba/ dzu ha ba/ dzuM hu bi ba/ dzu hu bi ma/ Du b+hi nya 'dzin pa dang gsog pa la'o zhes pa la/ a ma sogs sbyar ba'i phyogs la/ bi b+ha rAM tsa kA ra/ ba b+hi rA mA sa/ bi b+ha rAM ba b+hU ba sogs dang Am

277a5(mdo 'grel): b+ho dza bi lA pa b+h+rid+ga:/ dza ga tra pa trA Na ta nu ta b+hu to dzag+hA han taba na kaM saM ki la/ bA su de ba:/ gcod byed lha min yan lag ma yi mig sman gyi/ /dpal mo'i gdong gi pad tshal rnam rol bud ba ni/ /'gro ba'i skyabs dang skyob pa phra bar

279b5(mdo 'grel): A na rtse/ A na rtsA te/ A ma rtsi re/ A na rtsi She/ A na rtsA the/ A na rtsi d+hwa/ A na rtse/ A na rtsi pa he/ A na r+Ni ma nye/ tsi nya gsog pa la'o zhes pa la parsmai pa da rnams sbyor ba las/ rkyen sa dang lkog gyur gyi rnam dbye pha rol la byings tsinya ni yang na ki ru bsgyur bar bshad de/ ki dang tsi

280a5(mdo 'grel): la/ be/ Napa ces gnas pa la/ be nyo ba ya na pi/ apa med pa la benya'i baya'o/ /byings benya ni apa bi kA ra Na med pa'i rkyen legs par shes pas gnon par byed do rang mi shes pa rnams pha rol la baya zhes par 'gyur te/ be baya ru bsgyur gnyis brjod/ sngon ma'i

283b5(mdo 'grel): ba la/ at+ma ne pa da rnams sbyar/ iTa byin pas/ e d+hiSh+ya ta/ e d+hi Sh+ya te/ a d+hi Sh+yen+te sogs so/ /shIng nyal ba iTa yon tan sogs kyis bsgrubs pas/ sha yi Sh+ya te/ sha yi Sh+ye te/ sha yi Sh+yan+te sogs so/ /o hA kra gtong ba la/ hA sya ti/ hA

284a1(mdo 'grel): sya sU trA db+ha bi Sh+ya n+ti pra tyA ya sya pra kri ya sa mAptA(mdo 'grel): zhes pa brda sprod pa dbyangs can gyi mdo las 'byung 'gyur gyi rkyen gyi rab tu byed pa rnams rdzogs so// //de nas bya ba nor ba 'am 'dzom pa'i don gyi rnam dbye rnams kyi cho ga rnams
284a2(mdo 'grel): bshad par bya ste/ syapa kri yA ti ka me/ bya ba shor ba la sya pa'o/ /bya ba shor ba ste dus la ma khel ba'am rgyu tshogs ma 'dzoms pa dang/ bya ba ma rdzogs par 'bro? lus pa dang/ bya ba zin ma thag pa'i grub zin gsar ba rnams kyi bya

284a6(mdo 'grel): a ga mi Sh+ya tAM/ a ga mi Sh+ya na/ sogs ta byings de gang du char babs shing rgyal po bad? bar gyur grub? zin gsar pa'i dpe/ de dag tu slong mo bzang po thob par 'gyur/ gnyis nye ba'i tshig dang sbyar ba'i dpe? ni/ a b+hok+Sh+ya db+ha bA nma? dya ga mi Sh+ya twa/ /Du pa tsa Sha Sha tshed pa la/
284a7(mdo 'grel): a pak+Sh+ya ta/ apa k+Sh+ya tAM/ e pak+Sh+ya nra sogs dang/ dzA la 'bar ba la nyer bsgyur pra sngon du bzhag pas/ prA dzwa liSh+ya traM/ prA dzwa liSh+ya tI/ prA dzwa liSh+ya na/ sogs te byings dngos? grub zin gsar ba dang zas bya ba ma rdzogs pa/ gang sbyar ni zas la 'ongs so/ de gnyis nye ba'i tshig
284b1(mdo 'grel): dang sbyar ba'i dpe ni/ a pak+Sh+ya db+ha bA na? dya? gni(mdo 'grel): prA dzwa li Sh+ya ta/ ha na 'chi ba la ha nra rita las syapa la 'os/ iTa byin pas/ a ha ni Sh+ya ta/ a ha ni Sh+ya tAM/ a ha ni Sh+ya na sogs dang/ sha kli nus pa la/ a shak+Sh+ya ta/ a shak+Sh+ya tAM/ a shak+Sh+yan sogs te byings de gnyis nye

292a4(mdo 'grel): sha snun pa la yang/ no lo pa(mdo 'grel): na ni dbyi'o/ /byings kyi u pa d+hA'i na yig ni rkyen ha sa dang po ka yig dang nga yig 'gro ba'i ming can pha rol la dbyi bar bya ste/ u pa d+hA'i na phyis/ nya ma dang dzha ba rnams la nuka'os/ nuka A ga ma ster ba sogs kyis bsgrubs pas/ daM da

292a6(mdo 'grel): tI lus bskyod pa la yang sbyar/ gnyis brjod/ sngon ma'i ha sa dang po lhag po/ nri nri ta/ ya zhes gnas pa sha sbrang gis rmugs pa/ la/ ri gri du pa(mdo 'grel): d+hA sya/ rita u pa d+hA'i rIka'o/ /byings rita u pa d+hA can gnyis brjod pa'i thog ma de la yang ngo? ldan myos pas shing 'joms par byed/

292b1(mdo 'grel): bzhin du pri tu 'jug pa la/ ba rI bri tya te/ ba rI bri tye ta/ ba rI bri tya tAM/ a ba rI pri tya ta sogs te/ ba rI bra tya te bA rtA su tsan+ta/ byings pa da/ sras/ d+hwa sa/ baM tsa/ b+h+raM sha/ ka sha/ pa ta/ skad rnams la yang pha rol las gnyis brjod pa'i thog ma de la nI ka A ga ma ster bar

296a2(mdo 'grel): la yon tan 'byung ba ma yin te/ yon tan mi byed pas/ bu b+hU Sha ti/ laT bu b+hA She ta/ ling bu b+hu Sha tu/ laT bu b+hU Sha tA ta/ lang e ba b+hU Shata sogs so/ /de bzhin du tsa nyi gsog pa las/ tsinya'i tsa ka ru bsgyur ba dang mi bsgyur ba 'dam ka can du byed pas/ /gnyis brjod/
296a3(mdo 'grel): tsi ki sa'am/ tsi tsis zhes gnas pa la/ se dIrg+ha(mdo 'grel): sa la ring po'o/ /'dod pa'i don gyi rkyen sa pha rol la byings thung ngu yin na ring por 'gyur te/ i ring por bsgyur bas/ tsi kI Sha ti/ laT tsi tsI Sha ti/ ling tsi kI She ta/ ling tsi tsI She ta/ tsi kI Sha tu/ loT tsi tsI
296a4(mdo 'grel): Sha tu/ a tsi kI/ Sha ta/ lang a tsi tsI Shata sogs so/ /dzi rgyal ba las/ 'dod ba'i don gyi rkyen sa dang lkog gyur gyi rnam dbye rnams pha rol la byings dzi ni gi ru 'gyur bar bshad pas/ dzi gir bsgyur ba sogs kyis bsgrubs pas/ /dzi gI Sha
296a5(mdo 'grel): te/ dzi gI Sha ta/ dzi gI Sha tu/ dzi gI Sha tA ta/ a dzi gI Shata sogs so/ /de bzhin du yu 'dren pa la/ yu laTa yU Sha ti/ ling yu yU Sha ta/ yu yU Sha tu/ loTa yu yU Sha tA ta/ lang a yu yU Shata sogs dang/ hu sbyin pa la/ dzu hU Sha ti/ laT
296a6(mdo 'grel): dzu hU She ta/ dzu hU Sha tu/ loTa dzu hU Sha tA ta/ a dzu hU Shata sogs dang/ ru sgra la ru rU Sha ti/ laTa ru rU She ta/ ling ru rU Sha ta loTa ru rU Sha tAta/ lang a ru rU Sha ta sogs so/ /Du pa tsa Sha 'tshed pa la/ sa gnyis brjod/ sngon ma'i has dang po lhag po
296a7(mdo 'grel): 'os tsa phyis pas/ pa patsa/ /sa zhes gnas pa la/ ya(mdo 'grel): se/ sa la a i'o/ /rkyen sa pha rol byings gnyis brjod pa'i thog ma de a yig yin na i yig tu 'gyur te/ a ir bsgyur bas/ pi bak+Sha ti/ laT pi pak+She ta/ ling pi
296b1(mdo 'grel): pak+Sha tu/ laTa? pi pak+Sha tA ta/ lang a pi pak+Sha ta sogs dang/ de bzhin du pA btung ba la/ pi pA sa ti/ laTa pi pA sa te/ ling pi pA sa tu/ laTa pi pA sa tAta/ lang a pi pA sa ta sogs so/ /tyadza lang tsho yol ba la/ ti tyak+Sha ti/ laTa ti tyak+She ta/ ling ti tyak+Sha
296b2(mdo 'grel): tu/ loTa ti tya k+Sha tAta/ lang a ti tya k+Sha ta sogs so/ /pri tsI mchod pa la/ pi prik+Sha ti/ laTa pi prik+She ta/ ling bi prik+Sha tu/ loTa pi prik+Sha tAta/ lang a pa prik+Sha ta sogs so/ /batsa brjod pa la/ bi bak+Sha ti/ laTa bi bak+She ta/ ling bi bak+Sha tu/ loTa bi bak+Sha tAta/ lang a bi
296b3(mdo 'grel): bak+Sha ta sogs dang/ graha nye bar len pa la/ sa graha sogs kyis slar yang dag par bsgyur ba sogs kyis bsgrubs pas/ dzi g+h+rik+Sha ti/ laTa dzi g+h+rik+Sha ta/ ling dzi g+h+rik+Sha tu/ laTa dzi g+h+rik+Sha tA ta/ lang a dzi g+h+rik+Sha ta/ de bzhin du pra tsha shes par 'dod pa la/
296b4(mdo 'grel): bi prik+Sha ti/ laTa pi prik+Shai ta/ ling pi prik+Sha tu/ loTa pi prik+Sha tA ta/ lang a pi prik+Sha ta sogs so/ /han 'tshe ba la/ sa gnyis brjod/ han gyi g+ha/ ku ha dag gi cur bsgyur bas/ ji g+he nu/ sa zhes gnas pa la/ han+te(mdo 'grel): se Ni ta/ ha na les sa Na 'gro ba'o//
296b5(mdo 'grel): han las pha rol gyi 'dod pa'i rkyen sa la Na 'gro ba'i ming can zhes bya la go dgos pa ni 'phel ba byed pa'i don te/ 'phel pa byas pas/ dzi g+hAM sa ti/ laTa dzi g+hAM se ta/ ling dzi g+hAM sa tu/ loTa dzi g+hAM sa tAta/ lang a dzi g+hAM sata sogs so/ /Du
296b6(mdo 'grel): krinya byed pa las sbyar/ rita ir/ rita a ri'o/ /byings mdza' i ri yig ni rkyen sa dang kang 'gro ba'i ming can pha rol la ir du 'gyur te/ ri ir du bsgyur/ gnyis brjod sngon ma'i has dang po lhag po/ /ku ha dag gi tsu/ ya ba sogs kyis
296b7(mdo 'grel): i phyi ma ring por bsgyur ba sogs kyis bsgrubs pas/ tse kIrSha ti/ laTa tsi kArShe ta/ ling tsi kIrSha tu/ loTa tsi kIrSha tAta/ lang a tsi kIrSha ta sogs dang/ de bzhin du h+rinya 'phrog pa la/ dzi hA rI ti/ laTa dzi hIrShe ta/ ling dzi hA rSha tu/ loTa dzi hIrSha tA ta
297a1(mdo 'grel): lang ya dzi hIrSha ta sogs dang/ trI rgya la ba la/ ti tIrSha ti/ laTa ti tIrShi ta/ ling ti tIrSha tu/ lota tI tIrSha tAtra/ lang a ati tArShi ta sogs so/ /Du krinya byed pa la sa ri ir gnyis brjod pa sogs kyis tsi kIr/ sa zhes gnas pa
297a2(mdo 'grel): la/ bzhi po la yag 'os dngos po dang las kyi don gyi rkyen ya ka sbyar/ ya ta(mdo 'grel): ya'i a ta'o/ /rkyen ye'i ata ni ab bi kA ra Na med pa'i yul la dbyi zhing 'dod pa'i don gyi rkyen sa'i a yang dngos po dang las kyi don can
297a3(mdo 'grel): pha rol la dbyi bar bya ste/ skabs 'dir sa'i a byis pas/ laTa ci kArSh+yi te/ /la di tsi kIrSh+ye ta/ lota tsi kIrSh+ya tI/ lang a tsi kArSh+yi ta sogs te/ nye ba'i tshig dang sbyar ba'i dpe ni/ tsi kI rSh+ya ta de ba dat+te na sogs so/ /de nas rkyen gsum pa
297a4(mdo 'grel): de rnams dang gzhan yang rgyun sna tshogs kyi 'jug tshul thun mong du bshad pa ni/ Du pa tsa Sha 'tshed pa la/ ha sa dang po las phul du byung ba yang ste gnyis kyang ngos/ /ltas byin gyis 'grus par byas/ yang gnyis brjod a ta 'os pa
297a5(mdo 'grel): gong ba'i a ring ngo/ pA pa tsa/ ya zhes pa la/ de ring ma yin pa'i don gyi rnam dbye tA sogs sbyar/ /gzhan la 'jig pa yang na 'jug go zhes pas yang 'jig pa dang mi 'jig pa 'dam ka can du byas/
297a6(mdo 'grel): 'jig pa'i phyogs la/ si sa tA sogs gyi iTa byin pas/ pA pa dzya tA/ pA pa tsya tA rau/ pA pa tsya tA ra(mdo 'grel): sogs sa ma/ pwa pa tsi tA ra/ pA sA tsi tA rau/ pA ba tsi tA ra(mdo 'grel): sogs so/ /Du dA nya sbyin pa la/ bdag nyid 'dod pa las
297a7(mdo 'grel): 'os/ rkyan sa sbyar gnyis brjod pas/ dA dA/ sa zhes gnas pa la/ i sme/ sa la i sa'o/ /byings dA la sogs pa'i mdza' i dbyangs ni sa pha rol la asa zhes par 'gyur zhing byings gnyis brjod de'i dang po de yang dbyi bar bya ste/ A i u?
297b1(mdo 'grel): su bsgyur/ gnyis brjod pa'i sngon ma phyis/ a pha med pa la sa'i sa la ta 'os/ sa ta tu bsgyur ba sogs kyis bsgrubs pas/ tit+sa t/ laTa dit+se ta/ ling dit+sa tA ta/ lang a dit+sa ta sogs so/ /de bzhin du Du d+hAny+tsa 'dzin pa la/ d+hI? t+sa ti/ laTa d+hi t+se tu/ ling d+hi t+sa tu/ soTa d+hi t+sa
297b2(mdo 'grel): tAta/ lang a d+hit+sa ta sogs dang/ nyer bsgyur pra sngon ma'i mAng gus pa la/ pra mi t+sa te/ paTa pra mi t+se ta/ ling pra mit+sa tAM/ loTa prA mi t+sa ta/ lang sogs dang/ Tu la b+ha Sha Thab pa la/ sa rkyen sbyar/ gnyis brjod/ kha pa sogs kyi sa b+ha pa/ sa la asu 'os/ la'i a isra ru bsgyur/ gnyis
297b3(mdo 'grel): brjod pa'i sngon ma dyis sa ka dag gi sngon ma 'os/ a su ru bsgyur ba'i sa yang dbyi ba sogs kyis bsgrubs pas/ li ta te/ laTa lit+se ta yid lit+sa tAM/ loTa a lit+sa ta/ lang sogs dang/ de bzhin du ra b+ha rtse da mo la/ riba te laTa ripsa? ta/ ling ripa tAM/ phoTa a ri psa? ta lang?
297b4(mdo 'grel): sogs dang/ ba tli ltung ba la/ bi t+sa ti/ laTa pit+sa ta/ ling pi t+sa tu/ lanyo bit+sa tAtra/ lada a bit+sa tu sogs dang/ A bli khyab ba las gnyis brjod sngon ma'i ha sa dang po phyis pas/ A A la/ sa zhes gnas pa la/ Abno a rI/ Abna taM 'i
297b5(mdo 'grel): a'i'o/ /ApnO ti ste byings A ba kyai u ba d+hA'i A ni a'i ru 'gyur zhing byings gnyis brjod pa'i sngon ma de yang dbyi bar bya ste/ A phyi ma A ra bsgyur a sngon ma phyis pas/ a'ipsa ti phaT a'ipse ta/ lid a'ibsa tu/ loTa a'ipsa
297b6(mdo 'grel): te/ lang i bsa ta sogs so/ /a sha za ba la/ a sher na yo(mdo 'grel): bA/ a sha la a nA ya yang na'o/ /byings a sha la 'dod pa'i don gyi rkyen sa'i yul la rkyen a nA ya yang ni 'gyur te/ a nA ya sbyar
297b7(mdo 'grel): ba'i phyogs la/ a sha nA ya ti/ laTa a sha nA le tra/ lid a sha nA ya tu/ 'o/ a she nA ya tA ta/ 'ang A sha nA ya ta sogs dang/ sa sbyar ba'i phyogs la/ gnyis brjod/ dbyangs dang po'i pha rol lo zhes bas sha gong ma mi dbyi/ sal a su 'os
298a1(mdo 'grel): a phyi ma is su bsgyur/ sa ka dag gi sngon ma 'os/ sra phyis/ iTa sbyor ba sogs kyis bsgrubs pas/ a shi shi Shata/ a shi shi Sha ta/ a shi shi Sha tu/ a shi shi Sha tA ta/ A shi shi Sha ta sogs to/ a shi tu
298a2(mdo 'grel): mits+tsha ti zhes pa'i don la/ a sha nA ya ti/ a shi shi Sha ti/ gu pu sbed pa la steng na tshig la 'ong zhes sa pa la/ gubb+hya(mdo 'grel): grub rnams las so/ /byings gu la/ laTa taM dzu/ kita/ mAna/ ling ba d+hA/ dA nu/ shA na loTa rnams las rang lang gi don la sa rkyen du 'gyur te/ sa
298a3(mdo 'grel): zes bza' bar 'dod sbyar/ gnyis zes bza' bar 'dod brjod pa sogs kyis/ dzu gupsa ti/ dzu gu pse ta/ dzu gupsa tu/ dzu gu psa ta/ lang a dzu gu psa ta sogs par smai pa da dang/ laTa dzu gu psa te sogs at+ma na pa da rnams so/ /de bzhin du ti dza bzod pa
298a4(mdo 'grel): la/ ti ti k+Sha ti/ ti ti k+She ta/ ti ti k+Sha tu/ loTa ti ti k+Sha tA ta/ lang a ti ti k+Sha ta sogs laTa dang/ ling ti tik+Sha te/ loTa sogs so/ /kiitra na de sangs pa la ste the tshom la yang ngo zhes pa la/ tsi kit+sa ti/ laTa tsi ki t+se ta/ ling ci ki t+sa tu loTa tsi ki t+sa
298a5(mdo 'grel): tA ta/ lang a laTa tsi kat+si ta ling sogs so/ /mAn rnam par dpyod pa la/ sa gnyis brjod/ sngon laTa ma'i ha sa dang po lhag po/ sa la a i 'os sngon ma'i a i/ ma na sogs kyi dbyangs dang po de sa pha rol la ring por bsgyur par
298a6(mdo 'grel): bshad pas/ i ring por bsgyur ba sogs kyis/ /mI mAM sa ti/ laTa mI mAM seta/ laMnga mI mAM sa tu/ lota mI mAM sa tAta/ lang a mI mAM sata sogs dang/ de bzhin du ba d+hI smad pa la/ bI b+hat+sa ti laTa bI b+hat+se ta/ ling bI bAt+sa tu/ loTa bI
298a7(mdo 'grel): b+hat+sa tA tra/ lang a bI pha t+sa ta sogs dang/ laTa pI pha t+sa te sogs so/ /dAna dang shAn gzi brjid la/ dI dAM sa te/ laTa dI dAM sa te ling dI dAM sa tAM/ loTa a dI dAM sa ta lang sogs dang/ shI shAM sa te/ laTa shI shAM sa te/ lid shI shAM sa tAM/ loTa
298b1(mdo 'grel): a shI shAM sa ta/ lang sogs so/ /gu pu bsrung pa la'ang/ /A ya(mdo 'grel): A ya'o/ /byings gu pu ba srung ba/ d+hU pa/ bits+tsha/ paN/ pan/ rnams las dngos po dang rang gi don la rkyen A ya 'gyur la/ A ya pha rol la byings gu pra kyi dang po'i dbyangs de yon tan du 'gyur
298b2(mdo 'grel): par bshad de/ A ya sbyar yon tan byas pas/ go pA ya ti/ laTa go pA ye ta/ ling go pA ya tu/ loTa goM pA ye tA ta/ lang a go pA yata sogs so/ /de bzhin du d+hu pa ches gdungs pa la/ d+hU pA ya ti/ laTa d+hU pA ye ta/ lid d+hU pA ya tu/ loTa d+hU pA ya
298b3(mdo 'grel): tA ta/ lang a d+hU pA ya ta sogs mo/ /bits+tsha 'gro ba la khi ts+tsha ya ti/ laTa bits+tsha ya ti/ laTa bitsya yeta/ ling bits+tsha ya tu/ loTa bits+tshA ya ta ta/ lang a bits+tshA yata sogs so/ /paN dang pa na 'du 'og da dang bstod pa la/ pa NA ya/ ti sogs dang/ pa nA ya ti sogs so/ /nAmno ya a'i
298b4(mdo 'grel): tsA sya/ ming la yaste a'i yang a'i'o/ /ming la bdag nyid 'dod pa dang re smon gyi don la ming byings su bsgrubs pa'i rkyen ya 'gyur zhing rkyen ya pha rol la ming dang byings kyi mdza' i dbyangs a ni a'i du 'gyur te/ At+ma na(mdo 'grel): bu tra mits+tsha
298b5(mdo 'grel): te zhes pa'i don la/ bu trA ya ti/ d+ha na mi ts+tsha ti zhes pa'i don la/ d+ha nI sa ti sogs so/ /ya rkyen pha rol la ming u da ka ni u dan zhes par bsgyur bar bshad de/ u da ka mits+tsha ti zhes pa'i don la/ u da n+ya ti ming las 'dod pa'i don la rkyen ka
298b6(mdo 'grel): bdag nyid bu 'dod mya'ang 'jug par nor 'dod bshad de/ bu tra na ba 'dod mits+tsha ti zhes pa'i don la/ bu tra ka mya ti sogs so/ /ka ra No tsa ya(mdo 'grel): byed chu 'dod pa la 'ang ya'o/ /byings chu 'dod kaN+Dha la sogs pa rnams las byed
298b7(mdo 'grel): pa'i don la'ang rkyen ya 'gyur te/ kaN+Da ka ro ti zhes pa'i don la/ kaN+Du ya ti bu 'dod par byed sogs so/ /nyi Di? te ra bu 'dod bar byed Na/ byed pa po la Di? Da 'gro pa'o/ /ming gi byings g+ha Ta la sogs pa rnams la byed pa po'i don la rkyen nyi 'gyur zhing nyid pa
299a1(mdo 'grel): 'ang Da 'gro ba'i ming can zhes bya'o/ /nyi tAM tra sre/ nyi nyid la thung ngu 'os/ spyir btang nya 'gro ba la 'phel ba thob kyang de'i dmigs bsal rkyen nyi la 'phel ba mi 'gyur zhing byings kyi dang pa'i dbyangs de ring po yin na thung ngur 'gyur te/ b+ha Ta
299a2(mdo 'grel): la nyi/ de Ta 'gro ba yin pas Ti phyis/ 'phel ba mi byed/ a pa bi kA ra Na sbyar yon tan sogs kyis bsgrubs pas/ g+ha Ta ya ti sogs te/ g+ha TaM ka ro ti zhes pa'i don la/ g+ha Ta ya te de bzhin du/ mahAn+taM ka ro ti zhes pa'i don la/ ma ha ya ti kha rta thos pa
299a3(mdo 'grel): la nyi/ ba ha a'u Dha ru bsgyur bas/ a'u Dhi ka ro ti zhes pa'i don la/ a'u Dha ya ti/ pri thA der(mdo 'grel): pri tha sogs kyi ra'o/ /rkyen nyi pha rol bum pa byed la byings pri tha sogs kyi dbyang bum ba byed sa ri ni ra ru 'gyur te/ pra tha chen po byed do la nyi ri rar
299a4(mdo 'grel): bsgyur bas/ pra tha ya ti sogs so/ de bzhin thog par byed do/ du dri Dha la/ dra Dha ya ti sogs so/ /byings la rang gis byed pa 'am gzhan byed du 'jug pa'i bya ba'i don la 'ang rkyen nyi 'gyur bar bshad de du bkranya byed pa la nyi/ byings la
299a5(mdo 'grel): yon tan/ apra sbyor ba sogs kyis bsgrubs pas/ ka ra ya ti sogs/ /de bzhin du pA tsa ya ti dang/ a nu sngon ma'i shA su rjes su bstod pa la/ a nu shA sa ya ti sogs so/ /han 'tshe ba dang 'gro ba la nyi sbyar/ ha no g+ha ta/ han gyi
299a6(mdo 'grel): g+ha ta'o/ /byings han ni in rkyen med pa'i rkyen nya yig dang Na yig 'gro ba'i ming can dang dbyangs dang bo can pha rol la g+ha ta ces par 'gyur te/ han g+hata tu bsgyur a pa sbyar ba sogs kyis/ g+ha ta ya ti sogs so/ /sA dI sdigs pa
299a7(mdo 'grel): la/ nyi sbyar/ sa re(mdo 'grel): sha ta/ sa de'i sha ta'o/ /byings sad ni rkyen nyi pha rol la sha ta ces par 'gyur te/ sad shata tu bsgyur/ u bad+hA 'bel ba byas pas/ shA ta ya ti sogs so/ /rA to nyau pu kra/ /ri Ata las nyi la bukra'o/ /byings
299b1(mdo 'grel): ri dang Ata mdza' la nyi bcol las bu ka A ga ma ster bar bya ste/ Du da nya sbyin pa la nyi sbyar puka A ga ma byin pas/ dA ba ya ti sogs so/ /de bzhin du/ s+thu pa ya ti sogs dang/ yA thob pa la/ yA pa ya ti sogs so/ /ri 'gro ba la nyi/ puka A ga
299b2(mdo 'grel): ma pu ka pha rol la ri la yon tan byed par bshad pas/ arpa ya ti sogs so/ /byings h+rI klI ri i di kri dza lI rnams la nyi pha rol la pu ka/ A ga ma ster bar bshad de/ h+rI ngo tsha ba la nyi sbyar pu ? byin yon tan byas pas/ tre ba ya te/ de bzhin du kli la/
299b3(mdo 'grel): nyi pu ka A ga ma byin/ klI pa a zhes gnas pa la/ e/ i A'o/ /klI nas lI'i bar gyi byings de rnams kyi i yig dag ni puka pha rol la A ru 'gyur te/ klA pa ya ti sogs dang/ de bzhin du rId nyan pa la/ rA ba ya ti sogs dang/ a d+hi sngon
299b4(mdo 'grel): mA e ngi klog pa la/ ad+hA ba ya ti sogs dang/ krIn mjal ba la/ krA pa ya ti sogs dang/ dzi rgyal ba la/ dzA pa ya ti sogs dang/ lI rnam par 'khyams pa la/ nyer bsgyur pi sngon/ pi lA pa ya ti sogs so/ /pa ta sogs la nyi
299b5(mdo 'grel): pha rol las puka gi yul lo li yuka A ga ma star bar bshad de/ pA btung ba la/ nyi sbyar yuka byin pas/ pA ya ya ti sogs so/ /shAng nyal ba la/ nyi sbyar yuka byin/ shing gi rtag tu yon tan nos/ i e/ 'tshams sbyor gyi yi/
299b6(mdo 'grel): ge sogs kyi sa de A ru ba sbyur? bas/ shA ya ya ti sogs dang/ de bzhin du sho phra mor byed ba la'ang 'tshams sbyor gyi yi ge sogs kyis o A ru bsgyur bas/ shA ya ya ti sogs so/ /prInya dang d+hU nya dag la nyi pha rol la
299b7(mdo 'grel): nuka A gam star bar ba sha da de nu ka byin pas/ prI Na ya ti sogs dang/ d+h+ru na ya ti sogs so/ /dzA na sogs kyi dbyangs nyi pha rol la yang na thung ngur bsgyur bar bshad de/ dz+nyA khong su tshud pa la/ nyi sbyar/ puka ra A ga ma byin thung ngur
300a1(mdo 'grel): bsgyur ba dang mi sgyur ba 'ang maka can du byas pas/ dz+nye pa ya ti sogs sam/ dzha pa ya ti sogs so/ /dzA na la sogs pa rnams kyi puka dang bcas pa'i sa pha rol la is su bsgyur ba dang mi bsgyur ba 'jam ka can du bshad
300a2(mdo 'grel): ded is su mi bsgyur ba'i phyogs la/ iTa A gam byin pas/ ji dzhe kha yaM ga ti sogs dang/ is su bsgyur ba'i phyogs la nyid pa iTa mi 'jug gnyis brjod ba'i sngon ma phyis/ sa ka sogs kyis isa 'i sa yang byis? ring por bsgyur
300a3(mdo 'grel): bas/ dz+nyi psa ti sogs so/ /tsu rA de rnyi(mdo 'grel): tsu ra sogs la nyi'o/ /byings dung la sogs pa rnams las rang gi bya ba'i don la nyi rkyen du 'gyur te/ tsu ra rku ba la/ nyi sbyar/ ab bi kA ra Na/ yon tan sogs kyis bsgrubs pas/
300a4(mdo 'grel): tso ra ya ti sogs so/ /de bzhin du pA la bsrung ba la/ bA le ya ti sogs dang/ tsi tI 'du shes la/ ci ta ya ti sogs dang/ tsi ti dran pa la/ i 'gro ba sogs kyi nu ma byin pas/ tsin+ta ya ti sogs dang/ a rtsa mchod pa la/ a rtsa ya ti
300a5(mdo 'grel): sogs dang/ tsu ra sogs nyi mdza' can la/ At+ma ne par rnams kyang 'jug par bshad bas/ tso ra ya ti sogs kyang ngo/ /nyer ba dwa tsi/ nyi dang ada las gnyis kyang ngo/ /byings las 'das pa tsam gyi don brjod pa la nyi mthar ang rkyen du
300a6(mdo 'grel): 'gyur zhing ang dang lhan cig ba'i nyi pha rol la byings de gnyis su 'ang brjod par bya la rnam dbye 'ang de ring ma yin pa lang rnams sbyor te/ tsur la/ nyi/ ang/ dpi gnyis brjod sngon mang hi? sa dang po lhag po/ aTa sngon du sbyar
300a7(mdo 'grel): bas/ a tsu? tsu ra/ i ang ces gnas pa la/ nye(mdo 'grel): nyi'i'o/ /'das pa'i don gyi skabs 'dir rkyen kar 'gro ba'i ming can pha rol la nyi ni dbyi bar bya ste/ nyi phyis/ la g+ho dIrg+ha(mdo 'grel): thung ngu ring po'o/ /byings kyi thog ma'i dbyangs de thung ngu yin na?
300b1(mdo 'grel): rkyen yang pha rol la ring por 'gyur te/ tsu gong ma ring por bsgyur bas/ a tsu tsu ra ta/ de bzhin du bsgrubs bas/ a tsu tsu ra taM/ a tsu tsu ra na/ a tsu tsu ra(mdo 'grel): sogs so/ /de bzhin du bid shes pa la/ a bI bi da tu sogs dang/ da ha yongs su 'gong ba la/ a
300b2(mdo 'grel): dU du ha ta sogs so/ /a di la g+hau h+ra swa u pa d+hA ya/ ang la u pa d+hA thung ngu ni thung ngu'o/ /ang dang bcas pa'i nyi pha rol la bying se kyi u pa d+hA thung ngu de ni ring po mi bsgyur bar thung gu nyid du gnas shing ang pha rol la byings kyi thog ma'i a ni
300b3(mdo 'grel): ir 'gyur te/ g+ha Ta sgyu 'phrul la/ nyi ang/ gnyis brjod/ a i/ thung ngu ring po 'os/ de ring por bsgyur bas/ a dzI g+ha Tata/ a dzI g+ha Ta taM/ a dzI g+ha Tan sogs so/ /na ri ta/ ri te kyi ma yin no/ /byings ri ta rjes 'brel can
300b4(mdo 'grel): gyi u pa d+hA ni ang pha rol la thung ngur 'gyur ba ma yin te/ b+hau kri 'gro pa la/ nyi(mdo 'grel): ang/ gnyis brjod /thung ngu 'os b+ha gong ma'i aau u/ dzha la sogs kyis Dha Da ru bsgyur bas/ a DU Dhau kata/ a DU Dho ka TaM/ a DU b+hau ka na sogs dang
300b5(mdo 'grel): yA tsa slong ba la/ a yA yA tsata sogs so/ /ba ha thob pa la/ ba he(mdo 'grel): k+ti/ ba ha las k+ti'o/ /rkyen nyi dang bcas pa'i ang pha rol la bying sa ba ha la k+ti A gam ster bar bya ste/ khi byin/ ka gnas don/ ya dza sogs kyi saM
300b6(mdo 'grel): pra sA pa Na ra bsgyur ha'i b+ha 'os/ ha Dha/ ta tha dag gi d+ha 'os/ ti d+hi/ Sha Tu sogs kyis de Dhe/ nyi Da 'gro ba yin pas b+ha'i i phyis/ nyi 'os nyi yang phyis/ b+hi'i b+ha la dbyi'o sa b+ha gong ma phyis/ b+ha phyi ma ang gi a
300b7(mdo 'grel): lo? brang /nyi dang ang las gnyis kyang ngos de gnyis kyang ngos de gnyis brjod/ di pa sogs la aTa/ dbyangs dang po aTa? sogs kyis slar yang aTa? sogs kyi slar yang aTa?/ 'tshams sbyar pas/ aau Dha b+ha/ tra cas gnas pa la/ a di pUrwa sya b+ha sya dza(mdo 'grel): ang la sngon ma'i b+ha ni dza'o/ /rkyen ang pha rol byings
301a1(mdo 'grel): gnyis brjod pa'i sngon ma'i Dha ni dza ru 'gyur te/ b+ha gong ma dza ru bsgyur bas/ aau dza b+hata/ de bzhin du bsgrubs pas/ aau dza Dha taM o dza b+han sogs so/ /nyer bsgyur bra ti sngon ma'i Sh+ThA 'gro ba las ldog pa la/ nyi/ ang/ dA
301a2(mdo 'grel): sogs kyis A i ru bsgyur ba sogs kyis bsgrubs bas/ bra tya ti Sh+Tha yata sogs dang/ bA batu da ba la/ nyi/ ang / gong dang 'dra ba la nyi 'os nyi phyis bas/ a pI pyata sogs dang/ kri bu rgyas ba la/ nyi yang /kri ba rol(mdo 'grel): kri ba'i ra la'o//
301a3(mdo 'grel): byings kri ba'i ra yig ni la yig tu 'gyur te/ yon tan ra la ru bsgyur bas/ laTa kalbya ti/ lida kalbye ta/ kalbya tu/ loTa kalbya tA ta/ lang? a kalbya ta sogs so/ /yang bi sngon ma'i kri pu la nyi ang dang bcas pa sbyar na/ bye tsI kli bata/ bya tsI kli pa taM/
301a4(mdo 'grel): bya tsI kli ban/ bya tsI kli ba(mdo 'grel): sogs so/ /i ti swa ra swasti byA ka ra Na sya sU trA t+tha? tyA ya yuk+ta bra kri ya sa mAptA(mdo 'grel): zhes pa brda sprod pa dbyangs can gyi mdo las rkyen dang sbyor ba'i rab tu byed pa rnams rdzogs so// //de nas kun

301a7(mdo 'grel): sh+yata?/ loTa pa sh+ya tu/ loTa pa sh+ya tAta/ lang? a ba sh+yata sogs dang/ ri 'gro ba la/ rits+tsha ti/ laTa rits+tsha ta/ ling rits+tsha tu/ loTa rits+tsha tAta/ ats+tsha ta/ la sogs dang/ si gro ba la/ d+hwa ba ti sogs dang/ sha dri 'gro ba la/ shI yati sogs

301b5(mdo 'grel): sh+ru ba(mdo 'grel): sh+ra/ sh+ru'i sh+ri'o/ /byings sh+ru na apa la sogs pa pha rol la sh+ri zhes par 'gyur te/ sh+ru thos ba la su sogs kyi nu bi kA ra Ni sh+ru sh+ri ru bsgyur bas/ sh+ri No ti sogs so/ /pwA de ha sba(mdo 'grel): bU la sogs pa'i thung ngu'o/ /byings bUnya la sogs

301b7(mdo 'grel): bsdud? ba'i rab tu bya ba rnams rdzogs so// //de nas byings dang nyer bsgyur sbyor tshul sogs ba'ang? bar bya ste/ ni bi shAr(mdo 'grel): ni las pi sha sogs la'o/ /nyer bsgyur ni las pha rol gyi byings bi sha sogs la rnam dbye At+ma na pa du?
302a1(mdo 'grel): rnams 'jug ste/ bi sngon ma'i bi sha 'jug pa la/ ni bi sha te sogs so/ /bi pa rA b+hyaM dzeM/ bi parA dag las dzi la'o/ /nyer bsgyur bi dang ba rA dag las pha rol gyi byings dzi rgyal ba las rnam dbye at+ma nang pa rnams 'jug ste/ bi dza ya
302a2(mdo 'grel): te/ pa rA dza ya te/ nyer bsgyur pra ti/ a ba dang saM las pha rol gyi ngas par 'jug par byed/ byings Sh+Tha 'gro ba las ldog pa dang/ saM las pha rol gyi draM sh+rir lta ba/ gamli 'gro ba sh+ru thos pa/ bi da shes pa/ prits+tsha shes par 'dod pa rnams la'ang

302a4(mdo 'grel): 'jug ste/ a prits+tsha te/ A ta nu te sogs so/ /A de donya nA sya bi ha ra ne/ Ada so so kun? nas gnas/ yang dag par gnas/ yang dag par lta bar byed/ kun du 'gro bar byed/ yang dag par nyan par byed/ kun tu shes par byed/ kun nas 'dri bar byed/ las dA la kha? gdangs pa ma yin pa la'o/ /nyer bsgyur
302a5(mdo 'grel): Ad las kun tu 'dri bar byed/ kun nas yang par byed/ pha rol gyi dA la/ ba gdangs pa'i don ma yin pa la at+ma ne pa ba rnams 'jug ste/ A dat+te sogs dang/ /ba gdangs pa'i don yin na pa rasmai pa da rnams sbyor dang/ byA da dA ti tsa Ta ka(mdo 'grel): mu khaM/ krI Donya nu
302a6(mdo 'grel): si ba ri b+hya shha/ a nu saM pa ri rnams la skyang kriDa la'o/ /nyer bsgyur a nu saM pa ri rnams dang ad las kyang pha rol gyi kriTa la At+ma ne ba da rnams 'jug ste/ a nu krI Da ste/ sam krI Ta te/ pa ri krA Ta te/ A krI Ta de/ sa ma pa bye'u ci nya kil? ba la sbyin par byed/
302a7(mdo 'grel): phro ba bi b+hya(mdo 'grel): s+thA(mdo 'grel): sa ma a pa pra u pa thi rnams las s+thE la'o/ /nyer bsgyur si dang A ba dang u pa dang po rnams las pha rol gyi shTA 'gro ba las ldog pa mthun par rtse bar byed/ legs par rtser byed/ yongs su rtse bar byed/ kun tu rtse bar byed/ la'ang At+ma na pad rnams 'jug
302b1(mdo 'grel): ste/ saM ti Shthi te/ a pa ti Sh+Tha te/ bra tiSh+Tha te/ u pa tiSh+Tha te/ bi tiSh+Tha te/ rnam bar gnas par byed/ sogs so/ /u dbi b+hyaM ta pa/ uta bi dag las tapa la'o/ /nyer bsgyur uta dang bi dag las pha rol gyi ta pa la'ang At+ma ne pa da rnams 'jug ste/ ut+ta pa te/ bi ta pa te sogs
302b2(mdo 'grel): yang dag pa gnas par byed/ kun tu gnas pa byed/ rab tu gnas par byed/ nye bar gnas par byed/ so/ /A ngo ya ma ha na(mdo 'grel): Ad las saM ya ma han la'o/ /nyer bsgyur Ad las pha rol gyi yam dang han dag la'ang At+ma ne pa de rnams 'jug ste/ yam la/ shin tu gdung bar byed/ rnam par gdung bar byed/
302b3(mdo 'grel): A yats+tsha te sogs dang/ A sngon ma'i ha na tshe ba la/ lo pastwa nu dat+tA nAM/ a nu dAt+ta rnams dbyi ba nyid do/ /byings mdza' i a nu dAt+ta ste skad gsangs dma' bar 'don pa nyam so sor bsdu ba rnams ni dzha sa'i yi ge ka da 'gro ba rnams pha rol la dbyi bar bya ste/ A ha te/
302b4(mdo 'grel): kun tu 'gog par byed/ Ag+h+nA te/ Ad+hA te/ A ha se/ Ad+h+nA the/ A ha dzwe/ a ag+hwe/ A haM ba ha/ A ham ma he sogs so/ /uta shtsa ra shtyA ga/ uta las tsa ra la 'don pa la'o/ /nyer bsgyur uta las pha rol gyi tsa ra g.yo ba las 'don pa dang bcas pa'i kun tu snun bar byed
302b5(mdo 'grel): don la At+ma na par? rnams 'jug ste/ uts+tsha rate sU traM/ rnam dbye gsum pa'i mdza' can dang sbyor ba'i saM sngon ma'i? tsa ra la 'ang At+ma ne pa da rnams 'jug par bshad de/ a shwa na sam tsa ra te/ rA the na si tsa ra te/ byA ba pa ri b+hya(mdo 'grel): kri ya(mdo 'grel): bi a ba pa ri rnams las

303a1(mdo 'grel): rnams mdza' can la Atra'o/ /byings dz+nyA khongs su chud pa/ sh+ru thos pa/ smri dran pa/ dre shing lta ba rnams 'dod pa'i don gyi rkyen sa'i mdza' can la'ang Atra de At+ma ne pad rnams 'jug ste/ dzi dz+nyA sa te gu NaM/ shu sh+rUShA te swa raM/ su smU dSha ti mi traM/
